reviews.review_content: I ordered new socks and boxers as I knew I would be working away for approx. six months and I didn't want to take my decent underwear. I hoped Danish Endurance would be a good brand and their products sufficient. They are not - as I expected. Typical Amazon rubbish with brilliant reviews. Within two months the socks and boxers are deteriorating badly. The boxer shorts are thin and after a few washes they are misshaped, bobbling, and discoloured in places. Dreadful quality for the money paid.The walking socks are also not fit for purpose. Out on a long walk and my feet are soon boiling hot and soaking wet with sweat. When I've finished working away all my DE underwear will be binned. Absolute waste of money.

This item is advertised as no label, I guess to appeal to those of us who get reactions to these or find them uncomfortable. I can confirm it has no label tape, but it has something far worse, a scratchy printed label on the inside, printed directly onto the material.I thought these would be different as make a point of saying that they're no label and premium, but unfortunately not the case. I really was hopeful.It would be great if the seller could be clear int he description about this or show a picture of the inside.
reviews.review_title: Beware of the printed label inside

reviews.review_content: Very disappointed!Worn and washed once to get a hole in the seam already…Don’t expect to pay this amount for that and it’s also not eligible for return…Won’t buy again.
reviews.review_title: Holes after one wear and wash..:

reviews.review_content: Bought for my son and upon putting them on they ripped very disappointed with the workmanship for what are normally good quality boxers.

I purchased these in high hopes a few months ago with the hope that I would finally have some amazing underwear that wouldn’t rip. This wasn’t the case. In fact I was left rather disappointed. Not only is the underwear average quality (at best), the advertised breathability is nonexistent which led to a deterioration of the boxers leaving me a half the amount of underwear I paid for with the other half ripped. I’ve followed washing instructions and got the correct size but this underwear ripped with the slightest movement. Quite frankly I’m disappointed and realised I’ve wasted my money on subpar underwear.
reviews.review_title: Does not last as long as promised!

reviews.review_content: I don’t have a particularly hairy ass, but these briefs have all developed holes in that area after wear no more than 6 times. Comfortable, soft, but material isn’t fit for purpose, at least in my case.
No way of contacting seller to ask about exchange or return - even if put product is faulty you cant return - its a joke - Amazon just takes you round in circles.
reviews.review_title: NO RETURNS POLICY AND NO WAY OF C ONTACTING SELLER

reviews.review_content: Thought the first were a bad batch but yet again all wear out quick and tear compared to other bamboo types I purchased in the past.
reviews.review_title: comfort top but quality very bad

reviews.review_content: slighty tight and holes and wear after a short time not worth the price at all. but feel more comfortable than primarni boxers if you dont mind them dying in a short time.
reviews.review_title: holes and wear after a couple of months

reviews.review_content: Product failed - very poor qualitySeams split openWill not buy again

I've got several Danish Endurance boxers and the size is usually spot on...these however are MASSIVE - I didn't need to try them on to see they were like bags.  Very annoying as Amazon won't replace (even though they weren't worn)....lesson learnt, wont't be buying from Amazon again.

Not sure why there are so many amazing reviews. They are okay but nothing special at all to be honest and the package area is quite small so if you are average or larger then it’s not that comfortable there.At this price tag it’s a bit of a rip off to be honest.Very disappointed with this purchase and in future will just stick to the cheaper ones as they are just as good if not better.

Started out great, but after a couple of months of having them in my normal boxer rotation, the stitching in 5 out of the 6 pairs I bought all unravelled right at the bottom stitch. I’ve pairs from primark that cost a fraction of the price that seem to last longer.It’s odd, looking at the reviews. Maybe I got a bad batch..
reviews.review_title: Great fit. Not very good longevity.

reviews.review_content: I thought I'd give these a try. Never heard of this brand before. They are just OK. Material is nice and they fit OK but the ride up a lot, especially after you've washed them once. Disappointing. They lose they 'new' look very quickly..

Very comfortable but after 4 months of use ( I bought 2 packs to keep them cycled through the week) they have all started to rip in the centre crotch area. Disappointing as they are comfortable and not too loose or too tight fitting. Why is is so hard to find a nice long lasting underwear ?
reviews.review_title: Comfortable but ripped after some time.

reviews.review_content: I thought it might have been bad luck that the first pair of these started tearing in the crotch... it seems to be a problem with the grey variety as the other colours haven't shown signs of wear yet. I probably wore and washed them 3 times by the time the tear showed up so not very enduring at all considering the price bracket. Also, they are too short if you're worried about chafing and will ride up and bunch in the groin which is disappointing. Won't be buying these again

These boxers are poor quality. They've lasted about 3 wears and have all already developed holes - all in the same places, which indicates a design/manufacturing issue. I'll stick to Step One in future. Currently trying to get a refund.

I bought these for running and daily wear. The material is too dense, they rise up the thigh and are generally uncomfortable. I frequently buy Danish Endurance products (mainly socks), but these are going in the bin.

The socks are surprisingly, very thin, but worse they are massively oversize. So large that they wrinkle up in your shoes and are uncomfortable. I doubt whether specifying size makes any difference to what you get. I ordered 6-8 and I am size 8.
Well fitting and comfortable, sadly construction is fragile and like others of their breed short lasting, disintegrating into seem failure and small holes. Sad I liked them.

Really liked these when I brought them they were comfortable and nice fitting but after about a month they all started to form holes and tear. I would take them off in the evening and find out that I had a sink hole sized tear in them.
Wanted to try a bamboo mix but was not impressed, all of the pack I bought failed on the crotch seam within a couple of months.
Good item, not sure if they are as good as described. I wear a medium size but should have ordered a small as they come up very hight on my waist.

After looking at the reviews and the price at the time of buying I thought these would be worth while for what they describe.However, whether I got unlucky with the batch, or this is the norm I don’t think they’re worth it.The quality on the boxers weren’t consistent, one pair had a hole in the back of the seam where the band joins the boxer.If you strength train, go one (maybe two) sizes up. Because of the size of my glutes vs the size of my waist, there isn’t enough fabric to cover my bum and reach my waist without giving my front an awful wedgie. Not for strength trainers.
reviews.review_title: Fit for most.. but not if you strength train

reviews.review_content: Decent quality but these are very low on the hips. (In other words your ar** crack will be on show.) Good boxers, just not for me.
Very thin material also week .

First time I have bought from DANISH ENDURANCE and was drawn by the sporting marketing. However these boxer shorts are a bit tight in the leg for the medium. Perhaps ok for a runner but if you are a cyclist I'd recommend looking elsewhere. The waist band is also a bit on the narrow side and find my BAM and Step One boxers better proportioned. Fine for comfort, material and also cheaper than those 2 brands but I won't be buying again.
reviews.review_title: Fit rather odd for a 'sport' brand

reviews.review_content: Bought a pack to try and my initial thoughts were that they fitted well and were very comfortable.I don't like the fact that they do not have a front pouch area - completely flat.They are ok with jeans and normal trousers but not joggers.I wouldn't buy any more.
reviews.review_title: Comfortable but no "pouch" to hold things in place

reviews.review_content: I'm sorry to say these aren't anything special.After months of wearing these, they are the same as any other boxer shorts, they go slightly out of shape, become loose fitting and have started to roll at the waist.I had high hopes after reading reviews but sadly not as good as hoped.Not to say they are bad but just the same as any other.

I really like this style and material (super comfortable and look like trunks which works great as I do lots of snorkeling and often drop my trousers in public:)) when putting on wetsuits) but after six months I’m  finding some of the undies have holes, one pair has the waist elastic slackening and the original quality seems to be variable. Disappointing as the company dealt with a holey pair received on delivery very well so I would like to be more positive. I think at the price this sort of wear and tear should not be happening for at least a year and a half. Maybe I have been unlucky, or perhaps they had some quality issues which they are now on top of, but I can only talk of my own personal experience.
reviews.review_title: 6 months down the line…..mixed quality results

reviews.review_content: I'd previously bought these same Boxers but Navy. I was impressed with how soft, comfortable and well fitted they were so when it came to me replacing the rest of my underwear, it was a no brainer getting these.Firstly the good:- Really nice soft fabric- Waistband is well made so no annoying marks left behind or fabric sticking out.- No annoying label- Good support ;)The bad:- I think the most irritating thing is although I got these in the same size as the navy ones (L), for some reason they feel a lot smaller and tighter. I have not put on any weight or muscle since buying the navy pairs so not sure why that is. Because of this the fabric can seem a lot more stretched and also ride a little higher up the thigh. Due to this I'v had to give 3* for comfort whereas I'd give the navy ones I have 5*
I like this underwear, the fit is very comfortable. No riding up, or slipping into places that they should not go.
These are nice comfortable boxers, the bamboo makes them cool and less sweaty than cotton.

Not the best but no the worst. Opend the pack and the chemical smell nearly knocked me out so not a good first impression. Secondly there not as soft as ones I have had from a diffrent supplier but close. Overall I bought these on a whim as they was discontented but I won't be buy anymore.

These are very comfortable, bought many years ago and their quality was very good now 2 outof 6 came with cuts and ripped seams out of the package so they have a quality control problem . Now have to figure out how to return the two to them for replacementUpdate: I contacted  danish endurance via email, they requested some pictures and they very promptly replaced not only the two defective boxers but resend the whole order. What amazing customer service.
reviews.review_title: 2 out of 6 came with holes….but promptly replaced

reviews.review_content: Good quality. Fits well but on wash the elastic gets loose.
Very comfortable, great fit
I liked the comfort and fit, would of liked a slightly longer leg

These are possibly the most comfortable shorts I have ever worn, but my god they fall apart easily! This is not a problem because the company will refund you virtually without question - to the point that I'm surprised they make any money! I have supermarket own-brand pants which are threadbare and still refuse to hole after years - 2 of these pairs have small holes in months. If, like me, you are the type of guy for whom a small hole in your pants isn't going to ruin your Friday night, go for it because they really are comfy!
These are really good quality boxers  with great stretch which makes them really comfortable to where  especially when I work in a bakery in 30+°c heat.
Very comfortable, great fit, and unlike many other bamboo products, durable too. Worth the premium. A very nice product that I'll buy again.
Very comfortable, supportive of your junk and very reasonably priced

These are by far the best boxers I’ve ever had. Extremely comfortable, look great on, and they wash well and keep their shape again and again. There are reviews that question their durability, but I have had no issues, wash after wash. I have also tried a very expensive well known Australian brand (I have three pairs of those) which are way more expensive, but in my opinion aren’t anywhere near as comfortable as Danish Endurance. Frequent ‘adjustment of the Crown Jewels’ is still needed with the Aussie trunks, adjustment is  rarely if ever needed with the Danish. Plus the Aussie version actually don’t really look any better or appear more durable, but they are more than 3 times the price per pair. My advice through my personal experience is don’t waste your money, because that is what you will be doing, just go for the Danish Endurance. All my M&S underwear and the Aussie bamboo trunks are now completely redundant. With the superb comfort of the Danish Endurance bamboo boxers, I now see no point in compromising this comfort. Go for it, you won’t be disappointed.
Excellent value great fit and great to wear
Good fit size correct have purchased this product again
They are a bit pricey but you get what you pay for. They are comfortable to wear they don’t ride up plus they look good. I recommend these 100%.

These bad boys are made with bamboo. I went to the zoo and did feel the pandas eyes burning into me.I was a little nervous considering it was my undies they were after but confident in the underwear department. These are good. I've had others that claim to be the most comfortable ever. They aren't, these are.I've had bamboo before and the others were quicker to dry when hung out but they got a little holy and resembled a fishing net in the end.Danish skol!!

I've bought these for a present for my boyfriend at his request. He has worn this brand for a number of years now and he loves them. They are comfortable, cool don't to wear and lose their shape after washing.
Very comfortable fit.
They are quite comfortable.  I recommend them

Bought these for my husband as he was a big fan of the brand. Quality has deteriorated and he finds them really itchy. Tag on back irritates his skin and the material is not as good. Wouldn't buy again.

I read the reviews I checked my size and I’d still need to buy bigger again .I’d be a medium purchased a large and I’d definitely need an xl , tired of amazon too be honest the messing around you have to do ..
These fit as expected but the labels that sit on the inside at the back are abrasive so you have to find a way to cut them out.They ride just like every other poorly made boxer.

I've had these boxers for less than a month and already one pair has allowed Willy Walter to escape through the loose fitting material. Have spent the day having to tug the boxers across which is very annoying!Erm ... so do they want my boxers back if I return then? 🤔
reviews.review_title: Less than a month old and little old willy Walter is already escaping! 😳

After wearing for a few hours the material stretched around the legs and becomes loose. It tightens up when washed and then loosens when worn again. Poor quality product.

Got these are they looked ok for what they are but one they smell really awful like they have been in a warehouse for long time as I smell that smell where I work with boxes coming on ships in containers really bad and two they are really small for X-LARGE will end up giving them to my nephew after washing them as I can’t be bothered returning them

reviews.review_content: I used to buy packs of CrossHatch  underwear and always remember them feeling well madeThese have fallen apart from day 1 with the waistband pulling off one pair and a hole appearing in another around the stitching.  And no, it's not because I need 3 sizes bigger because of my waist. ......Will put this down to a one off and give 1 more try
Good quality boxers. Comfortable. Look good. However they were not all the same size
Comfortable and I like the colours & designs. Unfortunately these lasted me only a few months before the colour became dull and they looked ready to bin.
reviews.review_title: Nice designs, comfortable enough but not long lasting

reviews.review_content: I find the waist just a tad too tight, but the boxers themselves  just a bit too loose. I like a bit more support and holding power of the jewels.
Worn once, shrank about 2 sizes in the first wash and are now uncomfortably tight.

I ordered medium instead of small but still tight around buttocks and waist.

There's an uncomfortable label at the back which is quite scratchy. And I was disappointed there was no hole for mini-me resulting in having to completely undo trousers (belt and button as well as fly) so I can pull the boxers down in order to visit the little boy's room. i'm persisting with them now that i've got them but I won't buy them again.

reviews.review_content: all good

I saw these and thought they would make a change from the Danish Endurance that keep increasing in price.Hubby likes them, just find they are a bit looser and can ride up, but not a problem when wearing trousers.Wash nice and holding up to the washing, tumble dryer no problems.

reviews.review_content: I like the style, they fit well and comfortably, but they come with nasty scratchy labels sewn over the waistband, inside and out. What were they thinking? This is the fourth time if buying Crosshatch boxer shorts, I always go back to them due to comfort and fit and good quality. Tried other more expensive brands but never get on with them so I always go back Crosshatch
Got quality and comfortable those is the secret set I had e bought because they are. Comfortable and good values for money

reviews.review_content: Fast servicePerfectVery happy with purchase
These are lovely jeans. However, advertised on Amazon as button fly. Delivered to me with zip fly, which I don't wear. Lovely fit in every other way. Disappointed!
Not fan of Levi's jeans, quite hard to wear and not streatchy,

These are my normal size and fitted great so I hurriedly took the tags off. On closer inspection it has these awful looking tears and white marks which weren’t shown or mentioned in the description or photos.
reviews.review_title: Jeans are quite distressed which wasn’t mentioned or shown in photos

reviews.review_content: Recently purchased the jeans. Quick delivery, right size and colour so all good so I thought. So removed all the labels and gave them a wash. After this I found a small hole at the back of one of the legs, the stitching on the inside had come away. Not worn them yet but can’t return them size it took all the labels off. Really disappointing. If you buy them, make sure you give them a good look over before taking the labelling off.
Material is not elastic at all, zero flexibility and it says strong on the label while the same is not mentioned anywhere in the description!!
look at the seams, they are poorly made!!!  there are holes, it's terrible(
Got a 33W 32L as have levis chinos in this size. Came way too big. Reordered 32w 32 l and they even bigger. All sent back - Questionable if a legimate article
Quality of fabric is fine, just the colour is darker than I thought. It’s regular blue denim; not the night blue I thought it was. Fit is good.
reviews.review_title: Colour is darker than I thought

reviews.review_content: I love fit of these slim but not skinny and Levi’s quality really shows...

In all honesty I'm a 36" but because of the stretch I ordered 34" and they fitted correctly. Look good and only £36 on a Prime Deal. So good I ordered a second pair in a different colour for just £30. My only complaint was it was delivered to the pick up counter with no packaging, just the thin transparent bag Levi send them out in. I'm not sure I want the shopkeeper to know what I'm ordereing, what size jeans I wear etc. - bit of a privacy breach. So whilst the product is 5*, Amazon service was 1*.Next pair covered in bleach spots.
reviews.review_title: Good Jeans, Great Price, Appalling Packaging

reviews.review_content: These have only lasted a year before developing a large rip as shown on the photo.Have pairs multiple years older bought in store that have no cosmetic damage whatever.Feel these are not the same quality as the ones bought in UK stores.Would not recommend!
reviews.review_title: Not sure of these are the same as bought in store.

reviews.review_content: Am so disappointed.  A seemingly fine Levi’s product, albeit too large a fit for me - I bought a 34” waist and should have bought 32” (though didn’t bother returning) - the material in the crotch has ripped after just a few weeks of regular wear at home. Sadly this has occurred outside of the return period, so left having to buy another pair of jeans. Won’t buy again. I hate shopping, and buy things expecting them to last years!
These feel nothing like the Levi’s I have bought from official stockists. White shoes have got blue on them despite several washes. Avoid.
I bought these jeans a week ago got them delivered when to try them on and the button fell off had to order more buttons from Amazon cost me four pound but done the job
I wish the waist was more eleastic
reviews.review_title: Def not as comfortable as it seems after wearing it for one day

reviews.review_content: Seemed different shape from my other Levi’s 512

EDIT: Ripped right up the backside after only 5 months.  Didn't hear a rip nor notice it, so I assume it emerged over a few days.These are my go-to jeans.  I'm middle aged so I'm not cut out for skinny jeans, nor do I like them but I do like a fir which hugs the body and these fit the bill.  Most importantly, these STRETCH.  This gives so much more comfort.  i was bought a pair as a gift a few years ago and I haven't looked back.  They are a bit tight at first, but they get a little more slack and stretch more as they are worn in.  They take on a quality of their own.  They last less time than regular non-stretchy models of Levis, I've found, but the level of comfort more than makes up for this.  The colour I bought looks smart.  From a distance they look like trousers.  Recommended.
I returned back as was not my right size.
Ordered 30w32l received 30w30l. Return was easy with Amazon credit selected for speed. Product looked OK.
The legs for this Jean are really wide compared to other 512s, recommend going a size down

This are very nice and fits me really good! I usually have problems finding the right size. I am having to give only two star due to faulty item beings sent to me. In the back next to the poket there probably was a little hole and they tried to fix it. It's Levis and expectations are high. Please check picture. Replacement one on the way, I hope this will be as they should.

I’ve been a Levi’s customer for years now and have finally reached the point where I can take no more.Levi’s are made all over the world and as a result the fit and quality fluctuate massively.My favourite jeans are 511 and 512. Well, they were but not any more. I’ve lost count of the number of times I’ve had to send jeans back now because each pair seems to fit completely differently.Will be looking for alternatives from now on.
Getting the right size takes time

I'm not sure what's happening with Levi's quality in the last couple of years but the slim fits have really shrunk. I own a pair of these already in a different colour and they're perfect. This is the second pair I've returned from the same range (512 slim tapers) as they ended up being more of a skinny fit. Maybe my original first pair were defects that were a little bigger than they should have been. I don't think I'll be trying the 512 slim tapers anymore.
reviews.review_title: More Skinny Fit than Slim Fit

reviews.review_content: Lovely jeans, nice fit and finish. True to my normal size. Disappointed they didnt last a year until a hole apperared in the crotch area. Whats my warranty ??
The stitching on the Jeans is really poor quality for Levi's and had me questioning if they were real

I bought the same number jeans in 2 colours. The other was a perfect fit but this pair were so small i couldnt get them on. I suggest buying a size up. Annoyngly i bought them for a holiday that didnt happen so didnt get round to trying them on until the return window had closed so now ive got a pair of jeans that will only fit someone with twig legs.
As you can see , too short in comparison to same size and both Levi's jeans and both from amazon. My advice to order one size taller

When you buy Levis, you expect the quality to be good.These feel pretty cheap and are showing signs of wear-and-tear after just a few outings.However, they fit very well (which is my biggest challenge when buying jeans). And, for this price, I am not minded to complain.
reviews.review_title: Nice fit but quality feels poor

reviews.review_content: Good quality denim
reviews.review_title: If you’re a 36 waist maybe try a 34 as these come up big

reviews.review_content: Fitted as expect and a good price. Really stretchy. The knee has torn after one year. Guess it’s the elastin in them as 100% cotton Levi’s last several years.

I liked the fit but the material is stretchy and also picks up a lot of fluff and gets to big after a couple of wears. It’s a premium version of a Levi’s jeans but in my view an everyday jean. I’ve bought 512’s before but this change isn’t their best choice.
Great value for the money and they fit so comfortably
Always buy 512 and got these on sale for a lot cheaper than the website

The fit is slim but not too tight, with a modern taper that adds style without sacrificing comfort. The medium wash color is versatile, and the quality is top-notch, as expected from Levi's. Classic styling and attention to detail make these jeans a timeless choice.However, I've experienced an unpleasant smell from the Jeans even after a couple of rounds in a washing machine.
reviews.review_title: The fit is slim but not too tight

reviews.review_content: These were a pretty tight fit compared to a pair of blue 512s that I already own, but I forgot that black jeans start off tighter and less stretchy than lighter jeans (they shrink more during the dyeing process). I'm pretty sure these will loosen off nicely.With regard to the debate about capital and lower-case letters on the red tab (and whether this indicates a fake pair), check out the two photos I posted. The jeans in the plastic bag are the ones I bought on Amazon. I took a sneaky photo of the other pair in the Levi's store on Oxford Street in London (priced at £95). You can see that both pairs have capital letters on the red tab. Decide for yourself, but my mind is at ease that the ones bought on Amazon are not fakes.(One small niggle. The jeans were posted in the transparent polythene bag you can see in the photo. It would be pretty easy for them to be damaged in transit. Cardboard or a thicker bag would make more sense.)
reviews.review_title: Definitely not fake, but a tight fit.

reviews.review_content: Great quality

Got these today. A few pointers for anyone wondering. There is a number on the back of top button that should be the same as a number on label inside jeans. It was. Stitching is as expected and good. Red Label is of good quality but does come with a upper case E. Levi's state that the label could come with an "e" "E" or just © as they need to print all of them to keep the copyright of LEVI'S, Levi's and the red tab (hence the red tab with just ©) the jeans fit well, good colour (got faded ones, waiting for darker pair) I don't know if this helps but I'm happy with the fit, detail and checks I've made against another pair. I also wonder if the upper case "E" is such an indicator of being fake, wouldn't the counterfeiters print a lower case "e" instead? I'm with Levi's explanation of this.
The jeans are great.just didn't fit I recommend buying next size up from your usual size

First of all I'd like to address another review which states these are fake due to a 'E' rather than an 'e' in the levis logo.This is NOT true.If you go onto the official levis website and zoom in on a tag of these jeans it shows it with a 'E'. I don't know why it's different, but it does look like they're using a capital E for the Jean's.Moving on, the Jean's I received seem good quality to me, just appear as the photo. Fits as labelled.
reviews.review_title: NOT FAKE as other comment's claim.

reviews.review_content: These were bought for my son, who is happy with them, they fit well, they have some stretch in them so comfortableon, and the fit is as expected, I would have given 5 stars but they came with the red tag on the back with an R only, I understand they are genuine and so many pairs go out like this but it is a same they have to do that.
The only brand of denim jeans I own, Levi are great quality and fit and wash well. They are also really comfy for everyday wear. Got these in the sale so an absolute bargain.
reviews.review_title: My go to denim jean brand

reviews.review_content: This is my second pair of Levi’s 512 and this don’t disappoint. The fit and feel is perfect. My go to jeans now and at a great price. No complaints at all. The colour is a nice dark colour and I’ve had compliments about them already. Will buy again.

Levi of course are going to be good quality jeans and so when I saw these listed at under £50 I thought I’d give them a go. First pair arrive and sure enough they looked great and fitted perfectly. I was so impressed I ordered another pair and intend ordering a third pair next month if they are still on offer.
Great quality and fit.  Comfortable wear and robust feel.  Thank you.

Tried the Levis 510 but they were just too skinny for me (I'm older than 20 lol) even though I could fit in them - just not comfortable so I had to return them to Amazon - Amazon were perfect in this regard again and refunded me straight away. Had my eye on these 512's in this particular colour (Pelican Rust) and they suddenly came up at £30 from Amazon so total no-brainer (and very strange seeing as they were £65 before and seem to have gone back to that price too - seems like I was lucky).I was hoping they'd fit like my grey slim Line 8 Levi's same size and they pretty much do. Even down to the stretchy waist which I don't need but may come in handy if I have a massive meal haha! The fit was pretty much perfect for me and they are skinny/slim without being too tight on the thighs - which is exactly what I wanted as my thighs are quite big. Colour actually seemed better than on the screen and I was happy with that. Definitely genuine of course - all labels intact and proper. Great stuff and I've finally settled on a pair that I really like. If you see these in the colour you like go for it - 512 seems just right for me anyway.

Not much to say really. On to my third pair now, the second via Amazon and I love them. The fit is perfect and good for active / sporty guys who do a bit of gym work, with a preference to a slightly looser fit in the thighs, but narrower from the knees down. In other words, the 512's aren't skinny jeans from top to bottom. There is a bit of elastane in the fabric which gives a degree of stretch for those who need it.

These have been my go-to jeans for the past few years. The only issue I've found with them is that the seem between the leg joints wears thin over time, eventually tearing, creating a hole in an unfortunate location. For the money, I buy and rotate 3 of these until one needs replaced.
Fit perfectly. Very pleased

name: Unisex's Crocband Clogs
description: From the manufacturer            Come As You Are                Crocband Style   Sporty. Stylish. Comfortable.   The Crocband Collection features original Croslite foam construction for reliable cushioned comfort, a sporty design that’s easy to step into and out of, and a variety of energy-boosting colors and graphic designs. Show your stripes!   Bold midsole stripe for a sporty lookEasy to clean and quick to dryVentilation ports for enhanced breathabilityWater-friendly and buoyant          1 Crocband Clog   2 Flips & Slides   3 Kids' Crocband Clog   4 Kids' Crocband Sandal   5 Crocband & Sporty Styles         Confidently comfortable   Crocband Clog   The most iconic silhoutette.         All flip, no flop!   Crocband Flip Adult   Perfect choice for beach, garden or anywhere else!         Sporty, stylish & comfy   Kids' Crocband Clog   Blending sporty with comfort for the perfect colourful look.         Sporty fun colours sandal   Kids' Crocband Sandal   Combining colour, comfort and sportiness into one.         Comfortably sporty!   Crocband & Sporty Styles   Bringing energy into your look with a sporty style, with a bold midsole strap for a sporty style.

reviews.review_content: I bought my usual size UK12/US M13 which I've worn for 8 years and I've bought around 20 pairs in this time so I know the UK12 fits me well. My Crocs are Made in China, Vietnam, Bosnia etc, they all fit great except the Baya.On arrival the black pair looks great with the white band and Crocs written on the back, but, the bottom is flatter than usual, it felt flatter and not as comfortable with my foot inside and it seemed shorter and narrower. A tape measure confirmed this, 1cm shorter than my Classic Crocs for example, and 1cm narrower too. I found the Baya Crocs the same, too narrow and short.There's also a lack of height at the rear to stop my heel slipping out, it's almost like a flip flop.I see several reviews mentioning that the rivets snap or the rivets pulls through the body of the Crocs, well, I can see this would happen if you drive a lot or sit with your legs outstretched as the weight of your heels will be supported only by the strap and it will always be under tension.Not as comfortable as my other Crocs, they look nice, but returned for a refund.

Ordered my true shoe size and then were too small so sending back and ordered the next size up. Next size up still too small so ordered another size up and the pair that arrived were the wrong size so are now too big! I have 3 pairs to send back already. Kept these to give to a family member (I ordered a W8 and a W10 came) starting to wish I'd just gone to a shop

These are not the same as 2-3 years ago, the shape and the material have been both changed (found articles on this on Google) to fit the general population. My arch is quite high so I loved to wear these due to comfort, I'm 9 but read the reviews and got the 10 just in case. But these are nowhere near my old ones. very hard plastic, very low arch rim (the hole your foot goes in is A LOT smaller than it used to be) pressing down and hurting a lot. These are also a lot narrower (more like a regular sneaker) rather than a comfy clog. As some pointed out, the originals used to be made in China and Italy, these are Vietnam.Maybe good for new customers with no underlying condition but if you are a returning Crocs wearer looking to buy a fresh pair, you will need to look elsewhere.Also, you need a printer to return these (thank you Amazon) so they do try to make it harder and harder to get your money back.
reviews.review_title: Not what Crocs used to be.

reviews.review_content: bought these and went by customers review saying size up. Thats my only complaint about amazon. its a load of hassle to send. Why dont the sellers put a returns form in
The size is inaccurate I’m a size 41 and ordered a size 8UK women and this was too tight as my toes has to curl for my full foot to sit in the clog
It looks very nice but the sizing is not correct. I had to give it away because retuning items is a hassle

Im a womans size 7. I chose the option mens UK6/womens UK7. I tried them on quickly when I received them. Thought maybe they just needed to stretch but it doesn't matter how much I try to wear them, my toes are literally squashed. Either I keep the back strap on the front of the croc and my heel over hangs the outer ridge or I open the strap to go round my heel and then my toes are squished. So disappointed as I had removed the label so can not return. They are literally in my shoe rack doing nothing. Be warned, they run small!
Went for men’s 6 women’s 7 they are more like a child 4 gutted !
reviews.review_title: Croc way to small sized up as well

reviews.review_content: I was looking forward to my crocs but they are undersized and more of an 8.5uk not a 9uk as stated.Disappointed as for me to return them it is €15 postage so I will only receive half my purchase price back by the time u deduct the postage cost.Make sure you size up on these.
these are very hard as hard as they are made out of wood.
Very cheap and nasty! Very uncomfortable too!!
Sizing incorrect. It says Men’s size 5 / Women’s size 6. They are not a women’s size 6. I take a 6 in all shoes and my feet barely fit into them.
I have a high instep so too tight. So disappointing as would have been so comfortable if it wasn’t for that. Had to return them.
The sizes stated are to small !!!!
These are not sized right, way too small

They fit ok.  But they are very uncomfortable. Hard plastic clogs that I find quite painful to wear for any length of time. The inside soles have hard plastic bobbles that offer only an irritation to the sole of your foot (see pics). Socks do help a little but to be honest that defeats the point of these shoes.All in all  .. disappointing shoes after reading so may positive review. Wonder if its the same product.?.
reviews.review_title: Not sure what the fuss is about.

reviews.review_content: I obviously made a mistake, so my fault, ..... but it might help some of you.Sizing.I ended up, ordering Crocs Unisex Kid's Crocband Ii Clogs.... after looking at several pages, they were the style I wanted, I went ahead and ordered from the the adult sizes they offered in the drop down menu.They arrived. Looked wonderful so I started wearing them. They were a bit tighter than my extreemly old ones but I thought that was becasue they were new.So my old crocs say M6 W8 for UK. I ordered M5 W6 UK. As I am a size 6 womens. What I got... see photo  were crocs that say they are M6 W8. But are not.Just be really carefull on the ordering. Having had several pairs without a glitch, either these were mislabeled or .......?  anyhow as I got them muddy I can't send them back............
reviews.review_title: I ended up, by mistake, orderingCrocs Unisex Kid's Crocband Ii Clogs,

reviews.review_content: Good product however one is significantly smaller than the other, despite being labelled as the same size. Okay when slipping on,but when using the heel band cannot fit on one foot. Unfortunately the first time I used the heel band was outside of the returns window!

Crocs are fine but sizing is wrong. Amazon have sent the right size. However, although the crocs sent out have the same sizing printed on them as the W7 pink croc in the photo, they are the same length as the red size W6 croc. Definitely size up. Very disappointed as I will have to go to thetrouble of sending them back.

These come up way smaller than my other crocs. I love the look of them but the ankle strap at the back looks like it is for a size down. I can wear them with the strap down but then it flaps about...again, unlike any other pair of crocs I own. Using the back strap is painful, like they are trying to forcefully squish my toes into the front.
reviews.review_title: Come up small. Strap is annoying my life

reviews.review_content: I sit in a wheelchair & all my shoes are close to perfect- after 35 days I noticed the glue has failed.. I’ve tried three different glues & nothing holds to the shoe. My budget says I need to make these work the rest of the summer

I have always bought a size 10 in crocs, and they have been a little big (4 pairs) so decided to go with a 9 which should have fitted perfectly. When they arrived i could not fit my foot in them, i tried to stretch them as they look great, hence why i cant now send them back. My wife is a size 7 and they are also too small for her. She has a size 8 pair which are far bigger

I needed a UK size 6 for my daughter, I ordered this as described to be in size UK5 (man)/UK 6 (women).However the items that arrived were crocs in UK 6 Man/UK 8 Women and even at that they were still too small. If it was a proper ladies size 8 UK it should have been enormous on her but it barely fit. I don't really trust the sizing guide now. The crocs themselves are genuine and good quality, it's just the sizing that's off.
Small fitting need a size up at least .

My daughter was pleased with these for her birthday this July. However after about 4 weeks the crocs band at the back came away and in spite of super glueing it back the band came loose again. I don’t really think that’s good enough after a few weeks wear indoors so are currently trying to resolve issue with Crocs.com and Amazon. P.S. issue now resolved and refund issued. Brought a different style of crocs with the refund.
reviews.review_title: Good till croc band came loose

reviews.review_content: They are all ok except the size is smaller than my last pair and my heel hangs over the end a bit. I needed to keep them as they are for my holiday.
reviews.review_title: These crocs same specification as last pair but they are definitely smaller.

reviews.review_content: Far too wide, size 5 women’s very loose as too wide. Had to return
Order a size bigger than normal

Found the sizing chart difficult to understand and even went on crocs website and was none the wiser. Took a chance and ordered men 4/ woman 5 that seems to indicate that mens sizes are smaller? My wife is a uk size 5 and they are too small and have sent back and are waiting on refund. They need to simplify the sizes as too much info gets confusing.

they are cross, comfortable and ok, but didn't like the colour, it wasnt the rich red it looked like on the screen more of a pinky red, didn't like the colour but the shoes were ok as shoes go, they fitted and were crocs as I know crocs. just didn't like the colour!
reviews.review_title: not the nicest of colours, a bit pinky, not the rich red it looked like on screen

reviews.review_content: These Crocs are very well made however they do not conforme to the standard UK size i.e. they are approximately 1/2 cm too short in length which for me (I am a standard UK size 5) made them very uncomfortable to wear.  The width is however true to size.  I have now ordered the next size up.
reviews.review_title: Good Quality - A little small in size....

reviews.review_content: Comfortable and good quality slippers
Good
Perfect for quickly putting on for the garden
These are sturdy and good quality but took off one star as sizes are a bit small but ok.

These are crocs.  fine if you like crocs which I do, but I always get the same size from Crocs, made in China.  These were made in Vietnam and are noticeably less wide.  Crocs are normally wide which is why I like them.  I bought two pairs,  one was made in china and nice and wide as normal. These were made in Vietnam and much tighter.Guess it depends on what you want, but is it too much to expect Crocs made in one country to be the same size as those made to same size in another country.
reviews.review_title: Made in vietnam and sizes do not match other Crocs, being noticeably thinner.

reviews.review_content: These are a slimmer fit than the classic and I wish that I had sized up. But, they look smart and are still the light, comfortable crocs that I love

They're ugly but good.  Bought to use near the water and around camp sites, which they're great for. Just a bit expensive for what they are I think. Well built and do what they say they'll do, so all good.

First time buying a pair of these 'Crocband' Crocs and the sizing is definitely unlike all the other Crocs I have bought over the last 15 years.I am very much a standard Mens 8 and previous Crocs have always fitted just fine.These are at least half a size smaller, particularly in length. My heel is right on the rear lip and makes them feel constricted.Hopefully they will wear in as I think buying a size up would be too big.The material is also a little 'stiffer' than usual but possibly soften up over time.I note that these are made in Vietnam which is the first time I have seen that. My earliest Crocs were made in Italy but subsequently made in China and even Bosnia!
Love the colour and comfort. Arrived promptly. Ordered a size 4 as I am usually size 3.5/4 but they come up small and hurt my big toe. Can manage but not ideal.

I recently purchased the Crocs Unisex's Crocband Clogs and have been completely blown away by the comfort, durability, and versatility of these shoes. These clogs have quickly become my go-to footwear for everything from running errands to hiking to lounging at home.One of the things I love most about these clogs is how incredibly comfortable they are. The footbed is extremely cushioned, and the adjustable heel strap ensures a perfect fit. I can wear these shoes all day without any discomfort or foot fatigue. Plus, the perforated design keeps my feet cool and dry, even on hot summer days.In addition to comfort, these clogs are also incredibly durable. They're made with Crocs' signature Croslite material, which is waterproof, easy to clean, and resistant to odor. I've worn these shoes hiking through streams and up rocky trails, and they've held up perfectly.Finally, I love the versatility of these clogs. They come in a variety of colors that can be dressed up or down, making them perfect for any occasion. Whether I'm running errands in leggings and a t-shirt or dressing up for a casual dinner with friends, these shoes always look great.Overall, I can confidently say that the Crocs Unisex's Crocband Clogs are some of the best shoes I've ever owned. They're comfortable, durable, and versatile, making them perfect for anyone looking for a reliable pair of shoes that can keep up with their active lifestyle. If you're on the fence about purchasing these clogs, I highly recommend giving them a try. You won't be disappointed!
Use these all the time in the garden. Took them on holiday. Fit perfectly and i have big feet. Very comfortable. Color is great.
Very comfortable, durable and easy to wash
Very stylish and practical. Very comfy

Love the colour and got them at a bargain price. I have many pairs of Crocs for the garden or pottering about. The right shoe seems to be tighter than the left, which doesn’t usually happen with crocs so not sure why treats an issue with this pair but for the price you can’t go wrong.
Delivered before expected date at time of ordering.Surprised how comfortable these are, will be perfect for the holidays coming up.
Sturdy well made will last for ages

I liked the style and colour of these Crocs. Fashionable and respectable.  There's good support with the back strap, they won't slide out from under you. There's also a good generous thick sole, so you won't feel pebbles and the like under foot.
Got these for my husband. He’s a crocs convert. He says they’re so comfy and easy to get on and off. Loves them.
I'm not a crocs man but need something for around the house.These shoes look amazing & super comfortable.Tbh, I can live without them as our floor is regularly cold.

No compatible source was found for this media.    Lovely snug fit. Very high quality material compared to your average boxers or trunks. I understand why people would pay the extra now.
Very comfortable you would need to go down a size from what you usually get
Good quality and fit. Generally pleased with these. I would say that the similar style Superdry boxers I have are much better though in terms of fit, comfort and quality.
They are fine, a slightly different style to normal but very comfortable nonetheless.

Bought as a gift, seem really good quality and material really soft and comfy. Hopefully sizing should be right but haven't been worn yet as a gift. Expensive for 3 pairs but calvin klein are, but my son won't wear anything else.
Loved them
Order these for a friends son and he’s really happy with them, great fit
Shame they’re so expensive because they’re branded, as they’re so nice to wear
Good stuff from reputable company.
Good colours , good fit . I usually wear longer boxers but these are nice and at the price I bought ideal . Thanks .
reviews.review_title: Snug underwear , not tight , great look .

reviews.review_content: I ordered them based on the pictures but they're actually much lower cut.  They're ultra low cut, not just low cut.  Also the whole foot is about a size smaller than all my other pairs of under armour socks, so they must be either US or women's sizing, not unisex UK sizes.  I'm a mens size 10.5 and I can't wear them without them getting pulled down toward my heel so the back of my ankle ends up rubbing on my trainers.
One pair of socks arrived with a hole in the toe, not worth sending back.

Who on earth decided that there was an XL OR a 12 in these socks clearly didn't bother reading the labels! Ordered 3 packs. In different sizes. Except they were ALL size 12-15!! So totally useless as I needed a size 10 which was what XL was supposed to be.
Not great, they slide down in my shoes
I have bought these a few times and the quality is getting worse and worse. Out of 3 pairs i have had to chuck away 2 socks already because of holes. Worn once or twice.
I ordered the medium based on the size guide (being a size 8). Nowhere near big enough, max size for Medium is closer to 6.5). Ended up giving them to the missus
Socks didn’t last long.  Started to bobble really bad, no idea why, and another got a hole in really quick.  Ended up in the bin pretty quick.

I’m size 9 and my ones covered up to size 11 so I thought they might be a little large however they are too small and the heel rides down which makes them useless. Quality of material seems pretty good so it comes down to a bad design both in fitting and especially around the heel. Short sport socks need to stay up and these don’t.

Baffled! I ordered x2 packs of these “under armour” socks and after one day of wearing them in the house the bottoms are literally destroyed and full of fluff, this has never happened with any of my socks and usually takes months/years for bobbling of this extreme to take place. Genuinely questioning the authenticity of these “under armour” socks.Although the pic only shows one pair, I can assure you this was for all 8 pairs I received.
Purchased 2packs only recieved one but got charged for 2 . No way to contact seller only offers refund :( product are excellent however
reviews.review_title: Only got sent one pack not two

reviews.review_content: I’m not very sure about the quality in these as I’ve just took them out of the package and just tried it on and the threading is already coming off as shown
reviews.review_title: First time wearing it and they’re faulty

reviews.review_content: My socks fit my feet fine but they're cut too low around the achilles, making them ineffective as socks. A couple of cm different and they'd be great.
Snug fit on size 9.5 feet so doubt will fit bigger feet.Feels more polyester than cotton ie bit cheapy. I guess classic build a brand then trade on it with lower quality kit.
reviews.review_title: Fine but smallish fit and material a bit cheap

reviews.review_content: After only 6 or 7 weeks. Really poor quality imo

Foolishly these were bought for my daughter and put straight in her drawer for when she needed them. When she came to open the pack (after being able to return them), she found that a sock was missing. . . so what should have been 3 pairs (6 individual socks), was in fact 5.Apart from that, they're comfortable and do a good job, but everything seems to stick to them, so they don't stay bright white for long.Had we had the advertised 3 full pairs of socks I'd have given them 4 stars across the board. But sadly we didnt; so I haven't.
reviews.review_title: 5 socks do not make 3 pairs. Check purchases straight away. . . Lesson learned.

reviews.review_content: VERY disappointed, the size chart "claims" a M fits up to a 7.5 size. I wear a 7 so thought I would have a little wriggle room. WRONG, if these even reach to a 7 you will be lucky. Tight on the foot and after a while make my foot ache. I would have thought under armour would be good but as normal they have let the side down. If you want these and are a M go for L instead. These are not for sport and are more of a casual sock. Will not bother with these again.
They keep sliding down my foot

I'm a size 9 in trainers and I bought the Large size and they are way too small.If you really stretch them then they will almost come up to the ankle but you'll find them to be very stretched to the point you can see your skin. And this is on the first wear. After they're washed you may find they've shrunk a little.
reviews.review_title: Comfortable, warm but way too small!

reviews.review_content: Relatively comfortable, however suspect in hotter weather that they will be unpleasant. Stated sizing is all off, do not fit an actual size 11 foot....slip down your foot when walking and therefore handed off to someone with smaller feet. Wouldn't purchase again and keep falling for the perceived embellished reviews on Amazon!

So disappointed in the poor product description. I specifically did not want trainer socks; and once received, packaging even stated “No Show” - I would not have purchased otherwise. Amazons choice but not clear product advertising. Poor!
reviews.review_title: Not low-cut; not advertised as trainer socks

reviews.review_content: When I first got these socks they were very comfy. However after a few washes they do not stay up and end up half way down my foot which is really uncomfortable.
reviews.review_title: Do not stay up once washed

reviews.review_content: These are really thick socks to work out in. They also come up really small

Socks are fine for day to day. They are actually quite thick around the toes and didn't feel breathable at all. I would not recommend these socks for running as they seam to trap heat and can get very uncomfortable.
reviews.review_title: Fine for day to day but not for running

reviews.review_content: They seem very comfy and great quality and fit, however they are still leaving bits of black fluff all over the carpets a year after buying them! It's so annoying! They've been washed loads of times and yet they're still moulting somehow.
Didn’t last as long as I expected
I expensive and get holes in easy

I ordered the 9-12.5 size as I’m a size 11 but these are tight in my feet and not long enough to go back up my heel. They are nice and soft but no use to me as too small. I have adidas ones that are a much better fit
These are an OK productPrevious reviews indicated they were thick n softIMO they are soft but not as thick as I would personally like but they'll do the job.
I wouldn’t buy them again as I don’t feel that comfortable in them like other pairs I have but for the price it’s ok
It’s good product , only thing I don’t like is 97% of polyester with I didn’t see before order
Soft and seemingly well made
Good quality comfortable socks
Although very good, well-fitting socks, I prefer them to be slightly higher up the leg.
As desribed
Decent quality, but a little on the small side.
Comfortable and good value. UA are  a good product. Early days but so far so ggod.
Good comfortable socks
Did the job
Good product

I ordered these socks to use on the gym and when playing tennis. They are very soft and extremely comfortable to wear, however i found they come up bigger than other socks of the same size. I found that the either bunched up around the toes or the heels when wearing in my trainers.I simply gave them to my partner and he loves them. I would definitely order again, just at a smaller size.
Very good quality socks, super padded, super soft and super cheap, love that you get can under armour on amazon!
Lovely fit, very soft and supportive
After going through loads of socks at work, these are the only ones that dont make holes in toes after a few wears. Nice thick well made , long lasting and so comfortable for walking
Nice socks, but took an age to arrive
reviews.review_title: Comfy, but took an age to arrive

reviews.review_content: These are very comfortable, soft trainer socks. The sizing is generous and they wash really well. Good value for money.
Bought these ankle socks for my teenage son and he loved them fits great wash and dry very well would recommend and buy again
Bought these for my son. He loves them. Comfortable and super for sport. True to size and a nice thickness.  They each really well.  Will buy again.
Had a few months now been in the wash a lot no holes yet, pleased with purchase
Great fit, purchased a number of these sock in different colours, they keep the shape, wash after wash
Good quality socks.Comfortable on the feet.Thanks!

reviews.review_content: Taller trop petit
I have had the jeans just over 30 days and worn a handful of times. Unfortunately they have developed a slight tear local to the zip

I have been wearing Levi Jeans for 47 years these are the worst ones ever. I bought a pair which were made in Turkey I bought my normal size but they were too small. I decided to buy another pair these were made in Poland I bought a bigger size these were too big. I don’t think these are real Levi jeans the tag is missing it’s Levi logo plus the material is very thin. I think I have been done by Imitation Levi jeans.

First pair purchased split where the back pocket attaches to the Jean and also next to the zip on the front left golf the jeans. So I bought another pair.The second pair I bought has done exactly the same.Levi’s are not the quality they used to be!!!I bought a third pair and they’ve done the same within 4 weeks

As others have said the composition of these jeans are not as advertised. These are 99% cotton and 1% elastain which means they are rougher and stiffer than the advertised product. Complete waste of my time in buying as I had to go through the whole return process to send them back. Why Amazon can’t endure that the descriptions are accurate, especially when pointed out do many times, is beyond me. Bottom line don’t bother buying - go into a Levi’s shop, read the label and try - buy there.

Seem very cheaply made and quite thin material (are they actually genuine Levis?)But the worst thing is they pick up dog hair, cat hair and, it seems, any fluff or hair from a mile radius! I had the jeans on for about an hour and they were literal covered in hair and fluff (and this stuff sticks to the jeans like s**t to blanket). Never had jeans that did this before. Washed them a number time and still the hair and fluff is there. I just use them now for DIY and gardening, what a waste of money, I've had better jeans from Sainsburys!!Unless you in a ultra clean room dont bother with these
Bought for my husbands Christmas these were awful quality. After 1 wear they have a huge hole in the thigh area. We returned them for refund. Was not impressed
The how for the button of jeans is not stitched. I tried to put the images but did not get any success.
reviews.review_title: The fitting is ok but the quality is not as per standard

reviews.review_content: Poor fit bit usual quality

reviews.review_title: Write corect info about jeans. Please

reviews.review_content: These Levi’s Jeans are fake.

I already had a pair of stonewash 514s but the waist was slightly too large and the leg slightly too short 34x30, so I ordered a 33x32. I was expecting I might have an issue with one or other of those dimensions but the fit was perfect! Unfortunately the colour is much darker than that shown in the photo on the Amazon product page. Why is that? What on earth is the point of displaying a colour photo that misrepresents the product supplied? Simply unacceptable business practice in my view.
Material did not feel very good

I have 3 pairs of these, 1 from the Levi Shop and one from Amazon different colour... The 3rd pair are these are clearly not the same as the other two. The size of them was the same, however when you try them on they are clearly cut differently and smaller.These are from India, not sure on the others but massively different... Sent back.
reviews.review_title: Read the other reviews about being made in different countries its true!

reviews.review_content: Very odd fit, much longer than other 32eg jeans I own and very tight considering they were meant to be a straight leg. Returned for refund.
stoffa rovinata
Jean vendu sur l'annonce pour un 501 mais c'est un 514
Materiales nuevos… mejor algodon 100%. Se acabo comprar levis una y no mas

Leider stimmt die Größe  nicht mit der Tabelle überein ist an statt 40/32 mindestens eine 42 oder sogar schon fast eine 44.Hatte mir dann die 38 und die 36 bestell da ich mir nicht sicher war welche da dann passen tut und siehe da die 36 passt perfekt bei einer Taille von 102 .

I’m in two minds about sending them back.

Fit well, look great but, do not last long and are very expensive
Bad fitting jeans see. To be smaller round waist I got 34 more like a 32
Didn't fit and quality was not what I expected from Levi's.

These pinched around the waist a bit so I gave them to brother. The weight of the denim isn't as heavy as it used to be — my Levis now only last a couple of years where it used to be longer than that..

description: Product details     Material composition     Pvc       Care instructions     Machine Wash       Country of origin     China      About this item   PORTABLE POCKET The poncho for men includes a waterproof pocket for a cell phone or some other heavily used items.
