reviews.review_content: Wore these glasses for one summer and the polarisation has gone blotchy after it rained. Will not buy again

Sadly this pair I bought the arm fell off !!! I’d had a slightly different pair from this make and was very happy but let down with this style , shame as everything from packaging to the glasses was very well presented

I tried the glasses for a few days out as a lorry driver amd not long during the day my nose starts hurting. Glasses were too heavy and not comfortable to wear for a long time during the day. However I decided to return them for a refund and two months later I still did not get a refund. I had to pay for international shipping to get the item back to where they came from and I still don't have any response about my refund request!
The mirror finish started to peel off after a half dozen wears, not good enough for the money- shame as lightweight and comfortable
Not as what was described lens are not polarisedNot worth the money
Coating on the lenses comes off very quickly.. bubbles up and just wipes off
Broke within 1 month the tint has rubbed off and only wiped them once with the cloth provided

Only had these sunglasses 1 month and the colour has flaked off the lens! Really disappointed as they look and feel great on!I would like an exchange as I believe the product to be better than this! Since writing this I have had no seller contact! Stay away this product is clearly not fit for purpose.
reviews.review_title: Poor quality! Colour flaked off lens in 1 month

reviews.review_content: The media could not be loaded.
Purchased these sunglasses back in May. Fitted nicely and looked good. However, only started to wear them regularly in the last couple of weeks and they are delaminating.  Not good value for money.
reviews.review_title: Delaminating after wearing for a couple of weeks

reviews.review_content: Shame they didn’t work . Just made glaring lights yellow instead of white and reduced vision. The packaging was lovely ..it’s a pity the product wasn’t. I tried to return but every time l did the status disappeared ? Eventually after 5 attempts l contacted Amazon directly who refunded me .

These were great sunglasses. I was really pleased when I got them at a great price.However you have to read the small print. The actual quality of the lens coating is terrible. You cannot get them wet or too humid as the coating just rubs off. Leaving patches of no coating. The small print of what you shouldn’t do to the glasses makes them useless for holidays. You can’t get them wet or too humid as the coating comes off. Certainly not experienced this with other glasses I have bought. Customer service offered a 50% reduction on buying another pair or pay to have the original ones sent back.Bought a pair of Nomad glasses which come with a lifetime guarantee on frame and lens. With no small print on restrictions.Would not buy again or recommend to anyone else.

These classes are uncomfortable on the nose. I’ve tried to adjust the nose piece several times but I’m yet to get a nice fit. The glasses are not mirror, or at least not as mirror as they appear in the picture. I should have checked I suppose, so just an FYI really. Also I wish the manufacturers would spent less money on the protective case and divert this money into a better product, just my opinion.
Not I expected forward unfortunately
Don't look the same when you receive them. A bit cheap looking
reviews.review_title: Don't look like the pic. Plastic-y looking

reviews.review_content: These are nice looking glasses and I love the way they’re presented in a Toblerone shaped fold-out case with a magnetic closure, everything is carefully wrapped in a light, silicon soft sheath – one covering each of the legs and another larger one going over the whole glasses.The case itself looks stylish; as indicated, it is triangular in profile and it has a black outer coating with a soft faux suede white lining – and I can’t fault it at all because of this, it’s clear that a lot of thought has been given to its presentation.So why the 2 stars? Well, simply put, I can’t use these glasses… The reason is because they are too narrow, they only measure 14 cm from hinge to hinge and although the legs will tilt outwards on springed hinges the springs are too soft, therefore, the glasses won’t grip or even stay on; when I’m walking they slide down my nose with every step. Or if put them on top of my head they slip off, both forwards or backwards, depending on which way I lean.Therefore, either way I wear these glasses, on my face or perched on my head, they fall off when I move and in just one day I’ve lost count of the number of times I’ve had to catch them. So, for me, they are useless which is a shame because I liked everything else about them.I’d suggest buying these glasses only if you have a small to medium sized head.(Last observation: I bought the blue mirrored lens version, and the photo of the model wearing them shows a gap between the sunglasses’ legs and the side of his head, there’s a shadow there, but on my pair there’s no space at all between the legs and my temples, the legs press against the sides of my head along there whole length).
reviews.review_title: Too small, won't stay on - blue mirrored version

reviews.review_content: I have had numerous pairs of sunglasses from this seller over the years, unfortunately this pair broke just outside of the returns window, arm has become loose
reviews.review_title: Arm became loose after only 2 weeks

reviews.review_content: Comfortable and light. Frame sturdy enough.But see picture not even a year old, purchased Sept 2022 & as you can see on photo right lens coating has come off. They've scratched pretty well & haven't been worn that much. Good price but obviously quality isn't going to be the best.
reviews.review_title: Comfortable & light but quality is bad. Lens coating worn off.

reviews.review_content: I kept these in a bag on a trip and the lenses scratched to the point not wearable. This should not have happened, just a fabric bag. Cheap rubbish I’m afraid. Shame as feel and look ok. But if so cheap a coating, are they really protecting your eyes?

Great hinge mechanism and comfortable fit, feel well built- but they aren't!I've had many pairs of sunglasses before and each have lasted me a decent amount of time with normal use, putting them in a case each time.I wouldn't classify 30 quid to be "cheap" for sunglasses and after a week and a half on holiday, the black metal paint has started to come off, there are micro scratches all over the lenses, and the film has turned black/been removed right in my eye line.I really am quite disappointed with these, considering all the other great reviews.And to anyone wondering, no I haven't been on a beach and thus these scratches aren't from sand, the lenses are obviously just very non-scratch resistent
reviews.review_title: With all these good reviews, I expected much better.

reviews.review_content: Definitely not metal framed!

First time using these type of specs .Do they help with night vision ?I expected to be able to look straight on at on coming traffic but this is not so , The specs do turn everything yellow so maybe that's what they are meant to do . Nice frame . Very comfortable, specs arrive in a expensive box that isn't necessary .Difficult one as I've nothing to compare with.
reviews.review_title: Specs just turn coming light to yellow

reviews.review_content: I purchased these because I am a rural taxi driver and the evening work on country roads has been a problem when cars with LED Headlamps drive toward me. I needed glasses that took away some of the glare.  These do that to a degree but are too dark to use just to drive as these roads have no street lights and the glasses lenses are very dark and I cant see a thing with them on.  I will keep them to try as a pair of driving sunglasses for day driving in bright weather as they look very smart.  Alas they do not suit the purpose I bought them for.  Seems they are better for Urban Driving where roads have better visisbiity
reviews.review_title: Very Smart Pair of Glasses Sadly Do Not Work For Me

reviews.review_content: I needed to pair of driving sunglasses urgently. Ok until I can get something better. Lenses are a little larger than I expected and darker. Overall quality fits with the price. They'll probably be useful as a backup pair.
To big for my head
reviews.review_title: Good glasses to big for my head tho

reviews.review_content: Very very easily scratched and loose the colour from the lens. Would buy again, but will have to be even more careful than I’d normally be

I purchased the grey metallic glasses. I was disappointed by the colouring. The image suggests a dark grey metallic finish. In reality the glasses looked like a cheap plastic light grey colouring - not what I ordered.These glasses are polarised and their nose pads make them somewhat adjustable. I will be returning due to the colour.

Bought these sunglasses as I work as a driver on public transport and as work sunglasses didn’t want to spend a fortune on them.I was hoping more than expecting and to be fair these glasses have stood up well, sturdy in design, stylish and great for driving in, I’ve had them about a month now and wear them almost ten hours a day. Great glasses and will at the price probably buy another set for the car.

The glasses look fine but there is a slight fault in the lenses. One lens has a small dot to one side and the other gives a slight distortion. However, I discarded the packaging before I found this so I’m stuck with the issue.
Good glasses, but they certainly don't suit the male frame in general. Much more suited to a female physique
Seem to be of quality materials. I have only used these glasses once since I bought them so unable to comment on them long term.
They simply did the job by easing the eye strain.
For this price are amazingQuality 10/10  for this priceIs coming with case, eyeglass bag,nice box!Sun not bothering me anymore while driving 🙃Thank you!

The sunglasses have a quality feel and came in their own faux leather hardened protective case and lens wiper. I haven’t really had chance to use them yet given the time of year but I’m sure they’ll be great come spring and summer.
Ok
Bought them for driving in the low winter sun.and they are perfect
reviews.review_title: Good for Driving in the winter sun

reviews.review_content: Nothing
The product looks and feels quality. It does its job when wearing it in the sun. Just a little problem for me is that the glass curve a bit soon much on my face.
It was similar to ones I already have and these were a gift for someone who would find them useful.
reviews.review_title: That the item is as advertised

reviews.review_content: I am 93, and find category 3 lenses do not allow enough light for my eyesight,  So will have to return them.H D Thomas
reviews.review_title: Ability to see when using them.

reviews.review_content: For the price I was surprised by the quality of the frame and lens. Also comes in solid magnetic box with glasses bag and cleaning cloth. I have a large head (or so I’m told!) and these look really good. Very pleased.

Compared to my cheapo ones from Sainsbury's that I have bought in the past these are of much higher quality. The whole frame is metal (but I'm not sure what type, maybe magnesium?) and they aren't too heavy, they just feel substantial. For this price you can't go wrong.I have the red pair, and although on the pictures you can't see through the guys lenses; if light passes between your eye and the frame then people can see your eyes but that's no problem. These lenses aren't quite as dark as some which is a good thing; and they really do a great job of taking glare away from light sources and making your vision crystal clear.I'd say I have a medium sized head and these fit me perfectly. Also, the nose pads are adjustable if you apply the right amount of pressure and bend them. This probably isn't the correct way to do this though as you may break them off if you do it too often. In other reviews they have said theirs came with a small screwdriver but mine did not. Not a problem though as all the screws are tiny + screws, to which I have many a driver for.Another thing to note is the case and presentation upon opening the package. I was very impressed and the "softish" hard case that come with them is also a bonus, will surely help to keep them in good condition but the case wont take too much stress. Then again the case will not fit in your back pocket so no chance of sitting on them.All in all, brilliant for the price. I may get a second pair and I'd highly recommend them.Let me know if this was helpful, my first short review.. Thanks!

I dislike nothing at all about these! I praise the quality and quick delivery very highly. I was pleasantly surprised when I touched the glasses frame for the first time, finding they were metal frames. Beautifully finished throughout. I absolutely love them and the price was unbelievable considering the CNC production and finish. Double the price and I'd still be happy!

I bought these to replace my wrap-around sports sunglasses; I figured it's time to grow up a bit and get something a bit more casual.I've had some ATTCL sports sunglasses for quite a long time now, they're in my car and I use them for glare when driving, they're not that dark but they do a good job.I've tried a number of different ones for casual use over the years but always went back to my ATTCL ones. I particularly like the alloy on my old ones. I'm still using them for driving.So I wanted a different style, and an alloy frame, and came back for another pair.I recieved these last week. While I've not had chance to use them in the correct environment (because UK weather), I have worn them to see how they are:They are dark - I mean, very dark; which for my intended use - going abroad in the sun - is perfect. They are a tad bit small initially putting them on my head, but I have a big head that's no big deal - they are comfortable when worn though. The alloy frame makes them feel really well made; they're a bit heavier than full plastic ones but I don't find it compromises comfort.They're honestly great all-round.I think I'll just check out ATTCL ones first in the future should I need another pair instead of trying others and being disappointed.
Solid all metal build. Nice accessories. Good purchase!
Oncoming headlights seem brighter than they used to be.
reviews.review_title: Everyone should wear these when driving at night.

reviews.review_content: The glasses are of great quality and very stylish
Great for the glare of the new led car lights coming towards you. Much more enjoyable to drive at night. They also aren’t bad fashion wise just look like sunglasses
Nice quality
Use these for night driving. I have excellent vision but some of the on coming traffic have terrible blinding lights and these help a lot. For me anyway.

reviews.review_content: bad fit
Looked ok on arrival, not going to last though.! One week in and sole coming away from the upper, not greatly made and I doubt they will see another month of wear sadly.!
Stitching came away after about 2 months

I bought these. They arrived the next day at lunchtime. I opened them and put them on. I wore them till about 8pm. I was happy with them till I looked down at my carpets. You could see where I’d been, where I’d walked, where I’d stood, where I’d sat in my armchair. The soles have a sawtooth grip pattern that marks the carpets. I thought to myself I’ll be wearing my carpets out if I keep these on so I took them off. I shall be returning them. This is not something I’ve ever done before. It doesn’t come easily to do so but I must.
The upper of the slipper separated from the sole within a week or two of light use. Returned.
Nice and warm and comfy at first. couple of days wearing its lost that spring comfort.very disappointed
reviews.review_title: The cushioning affect doesn't last long

reviews.review_content: Poor design. Fit and finish poor. Either 2 left, Or 2 right feet? Return when possible. Apparently. Problems with the post office and Amazon?? Until next week?!

I haven’t worn slippers since childhood and probably won’t buy any again.  I went for my usual shoe size and I have issues keeping them on my feet. Anyone that is elderly or with gait issues should stay well away from these as they don’t stay on your feet and are a trip hazard. I’m also not convinced the ‘memory foam’ is anything other than foam.
I have bought these before and had no problems but my hubby had this pair on him twice and they split. Not a great Xmas present. Very disappointed

I bought these slippers specifically because they were marketed as "WARM WOOL KNIT UPPER" and "Outer Material: Wool Knit" along with "Men's Comfy Wool Knit Memory Foam Slippers" being the consistent description.  I wanted wool, as not only is heat retention better, but also does not maintain bad odours in the same way that polyester does.  Also, the slippers listed as polyester sell for nearly half the price.`Surprise surprise, when they arrived, I looked at the label inside.  100% polyester throughout.  Not a single bit of wool in these.Dishonest sellers.

I ordered the UK 11-12 size as I’m about a 11.5-12 normally. The bottom of the slipper says UK 11-12 however, the label inside the slipper shows them to be a UK 10-11 and we’re a little too snug for me so I believe this to be the true size.
I ordered a 9 they are more like a 10 or 11 and shapeless comfortable though so shame they don't fit
My feet hang over the back. They are closer to a 11 than a 12.Do not listen to the recommendations from buyers.They must have tiny feet

I bought a pair of these at the end of 2022 and they lasted 11 months being quite comfortable, so bought a new pair as the insole was loosing shape and heavily fraying. Had the second pair three months and they’re absolute knackered inside. Having been a fan initially I wouldn’t now recommend.

I bought these size 13 slippers thinking that they would be ok for my size 12 feet. They are not, they are too small. They are more like a size 11 - so not happy. On the positive side, the quality seems good, but uncomfortable because my heel sticks out the back ...
I didnt like how it feels in my leg. You can hardly walk with it. I think the amount of foam u beneath should be reduced

These slippers are comfortable and easy to wash. However, I've only had them for a few months and already they are worn through.I wouldn't say I use them above the normal amount and also only inside the house.Not great durability at all.

They are a good fit and snug but I've been wearing them for less than a month and in the last week the inner lining where my toes are has started to fray in both of the pair.  I've only had them one month 😂.
reviews.review_title: Very comfy but starting to fall apart after a month

reviews.review_content: Comfy but can't see them lasting long. Phot is from about 5 weeks of wear.
Mens13 fitter neibour that wears. Size 11 shoes very poor!!❌
Very comfortable lasts well , last one purchased 4 years ago
Did not appreciate how low the heel is. Find myself almost walking out of them. However they are well made and comfortable.

the product is great and absolutely as advertised, however they were delivered in a clear plastic bag and left on the doorstep... my other half found them first and they were part of his Birthday present so annoying that it wasn't a more discreet and thorough delivery
The interior of the slippers has started pilling and coming away entirely after a month's light wear.
Husband loved these said so comfy and good quality
Very comfortable slipper, but I feel they are a slight bit smaller than advertised.
A little on the small size

Some reviews suggest getting a size larger, however I'd suggest trying a few around your size and returning the ones which don't fit.In my experience (usually 10.5) I've actually gone for the 9-10 as the 11-12 we're perfect for the first hour or so, but quickly as the foam collapsed and the shoes naturally stretched my feed ended slopping around all over the place and felt unsafe.These are adequate slippers.They do the job.They go on the feet and stay there.They are comfortable.They are warm.Oh they also leave black marks all on white tile floors, so I'd only recommend them for carpet use, which defeats the object as the reason for purchasing thes was to support my feet on our wooden and tiled floors...Life is too short to spend this amount of time debating slippers.
reviews.review_title: Comfy, but he sure to try multiple sizes

reviews.review_content: Ordered size 9/10 as a size 9. Slippers too small

The slippers are of reasonable quality for the money. Spongy foam insole and soft upper keep your feet warm but I have found them to be a little bit on the large side. I normally wear size 10 shoes, and bought the 9/10 slippers but still a bit loose.
Size 13 more like a size 12.

These are very comfy slippers and are nice and warm for the winter months.  However, the sizing is a bit weird.  On the sole it says UK 9-10, but inside it has a tag which says UK 8-9.  I am about 9.5 and they are little too snug - I know that they will probably stretch after a while (been wearing them for about a month and they are getting there, but slowly).
reviews.review_title: Nice slippers, comfy but size not quite right.

reviews.review_content: Comfortable, cosy fit well and lightweight.Sole is super grippy and maybe a bit much for use on carpets but I suppose they are more suited to laminate floors
These seemed very cosy and comfortable but sadly had to return them as they were slightly too small lengthwise. Would have been happy with them if the had fitted.
reviews.review_title: These seemed comfortable and a good price

reviews.review_content: Never had a pair of slippers before, but at 51 decided to bite the bullet and admit I'm getting old. These are great very warm and I can nip outside with them as they have a plastic no slip sole. The only reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 was the size I'm an 11 got a 11 and should have got one size bigger
I don’t really wear them because the backs are too low, they look ok though.
reviews.review_title: Like them but the backs are very low

reviews.review_content: These were bought as a present I was told they are very comfortable and warm
I felt the size was a bit smaller than I expected but otherwise good
True to size comfortable padded sole
Was a gift ,size perfect and cosy warm slippersHave ordered a second pair as giftDelivery as always 1st class

I bought these for my boyfriend to wear around the house, and he loves them. They're very comfy, and haven't experienced the wear that fluffy slippers tend to on the inside due to being a soft felt material instead. They have a good, grippy hard sole which is easily cleaned, and fit true to size. Great value, highly recommend!
Son loves them. Warm, comfortable and sturdy. They fit a little on the big side

My partner absolutely loved these. The outdoor sole is really handy for when he needs to nip out into the driveway, and the slippers are incredibly comfy. We were looking for a pair of slippers that didn’t quite resemble ‘shoes’, but also still had a lip on the back so they wouldn’t slide off. These further bill perfectly and the quality if the slippers is amazing. I can see them lasting a long time.
Very comfy and perfect fit

The sole of the shoe is very thick, so no chance of getting cold feet or anything like that, very sturdy and robust, and the pattern of the sole is very grippy!! The memory foam or whatever interior to your feet and gives a fantastic level of comfort! Highly recommend.
brought as a gift for my dad, they are so comfy! they look exactly like the pictures, he wears them every opportunity 10/10 from him
Fitted my husband’s huge size 12 feet and he finds them comfortable
very comfortable
Bought these (male version of mine) because I love mine so much, soooo comfortable and he's well happy, loves them!
These are very comfortable and, in my opinion, stylish too. The only thing I can say to criticise them is that they never come with a pipe.

The trainers were great when l first put them on.  Very comfortable. The only drawback was that the spaces in the external soles picked up shingle  --  so one could not walk in to the house on to the polished floors. After two months or so they started to "" draw "" my feet which became very painful.  I have never suffered with my feet.  Left them off and wore other pairs of shoes and boots --  no problem. Them again  -- could not keep them on. Waste of my money.
Look better in the pictures,  and not great quality, put in the bin unfortunately
Terrible work shoe, ripped after 3 days. Not worth the money
Not good! Already worn! had them for 1 month!! Front off boots torn. Cheap crap meterial only thing good is that they are Comfortable.Do no recommend!!
Not good quality an not save for work.gives body shock an current.not comfortable on feet

Comprados en diciembre , a fecha de hoy con dos meses utilizandolos para el trabajo están rotos y bastante deteriorados , lamento mi compra

I received these safety trainers on the 4th March it is now 25th March and the front toe is already through to the steel cap. I work in a shop yard and spend a lot of time on my hands and knees even so they should last longer than 21 days. I will be returning them.
Nice safety shoes but sent wrong size
sono di qualità scadente

"Ich habe Sicherheitsschuhe für stolze 44€ im Angebot gekauft. Allerdings, als die Schuhe ankamen und ich sie auspackte, war ein starker Klebergeruch vorhanden. Bereits nach einem Tag des Tragens begann der rechte Schuh zu quietschen. Bei genauerer Betrachtung stellte ich fest, dass die Stahlkappe vorne in dem Schuh nicht richtig befestigt ist – höchstwahrscheinlich locker oder gar nicht verklebt. Jedes Mal, wenn ich den Schuh anziehe, bleibt mein Zeh an der Stahlkappe vorne an der Innenseite hängen. Das ist wirklich erstaunlich und ich bin sehr enttäuscht von der minderwertigen Qualität. Obwohl das Material gut aussieht, ist die Verarbeitung und der verwendete Kleber enttäuschend.Ich hatte vor, die Schuhe zurückzuschicken, aber das macht momentan keinen Sinn, da ich bereits bei einem anderen Hersteller über die Firma neue bestellt habe. Diese sollten spätestens in einem Monat eintreffen. Die jetzigen Schuhe landen wahrscheinlich im Müll. Ich kann sie nicht empfehlen. Es gibt für 19€ sogar stabilere Schuhe von anderen Herstellern. Sicherheitsschuhe sollten uns gewisse Sicherheit bieten, aber diese haben mich leider enttäuscht." !
reviews.review_title: Bin nicht zufrieden mit der Qualität

reviews.review_content: chaussure de sécurité pas a la hauteur pour travailler dans un environnement chaud travail d’aluminiumle look est sympas c’est tout pour le reste passez votre chemin qualité mediocre le pied a l’intérieur et mal tenu le bout de la chaussure fais très mal quand on se cogne le pied au niveaux des orteil, chaussure lourde !! et très fragile ils ont fais 1 semaine vaut mieux opter pour une paire dans une boutique spécialisée et rajouter quelques euros mais au moins ca vous fera 2 ans
reviews.review_title: sur le terrain c’est pas la même

reviews.review_content: Scarpe si presentano leggere la suoletta all'interno memory foam e leggerissima non ammortizza il peso ne la fattezza sul tallone non ammortizza in piu il numero 44 in realtà e un 43 le cinture di bellezza laterali fanno male i piedi purtroppo le ho dovute mettere da parte dopo una sett. Di lavoro
Worn for 8 hours a day for the last two weeks , I have found them to be extremely comfortable and so far hard waring.

Non capisco come possano esserci così tante recensioni dove si elogiano le qualità traspiranti di queste scarpe. Sono comprate/false? Perché io le ho comprate appositamente per utilizzarle in estate, o meglio, per sostituire delle scarpe di un altro rand che sono durate veramente poco. (100 euro di scarpe distrutte in manco tre mesi). Fatto sta, vado in moto tutto l'anno e ci vado già vestito. Quindi scarpe ai piedi, mattina di settembre, 15 gradi e niente, non sento aria fresca sui piedi. E vabbè dico! Non sono traforate ma almeno dovrebbero essere traspiranti no? No. 9 di mattina, già abbastanza caldo. Sauna dentro i piedi e attività lavorativa discreta, ancora niente a pieno ritmo. Traspiranti?! Ma dove! Forse vanno bene in autunno/primavera senza pioggia. Per tutto il resto se volete scarpe ESTIVE cercate altro.
Kaputt nach 2 Tagen auf der Baustelle..Aber bequeme Schuhe!

Le ho comprate perche erano recensite come scarpe antinfortunistiche comode e lo sono peccato che non si possa dire lo stesso per quanto riguarda la durevolezza dei materiali. In tre mesi di lavoro si sono ridotte malissimo.
Commande les chaussures en jaune malheureusement elle sont arriver orange, elle taille un peux petite. Par contre elle sont vraiment légère.
I love the design of these trainers, quite comfortable to wear all day. Arrived super fastHowever there is an annoying squeak when walking mainly on the right trainer

Those pictures ar after 4 days of work in mouldshop,  not breathable at all, the ar made of some kind of material outside witch if you touch something sharp they gonna cut,not very comfortable.  It's my first time I buy something with very good reviews and I'm disappointed.
Having problems getting the correct size as UK and EURO do not always make sense. Should be OK with the next ones we've ordered though.They are good and seem very light.
So comfortable, but material at toe ripping easily
Very comfortable however steel toe cap exposed after 3 days use
The shoe fits fine but when I walked the steel cap was really uncomfortable for my toes, had to return it.
For the price they seem ok. I need a pair of safety shoes to wear occasionally.  Not sure how they will last though....

Shoes are like trainers in comfort but the material came off after a few months

reviews.review_content: La scarpa è fatta bene, è comoda, sicuramente non da indossare in estate altrimenti i piedi vi suderanno come nn mai. L unica pecca, è che sono ENORMI, sembra che indossate due ferri da stiro. Peccato.

Superbly comfortable work shoes true to size, spending all day in a warehouse on my feet these were sorely needed and didnt disappoint, would honestly say most comfortable steel toe shoes I've purchased to date

I brought these shoes for work after they were recommended to me by my dad. I’m on my feet for 8 hours a day and my feet were starting to hurt so I knew I needed new shoes. They were a bit on the big side but that’s okay as the laces allow you to tighten them very well. The shoe looks good too, my only bad thing is that the comfort of them wears off after a few weeks. They started off feeling amazing on my feet but now they me starting to hurt again

As you can see in the photo, it is a beautiful product, really light. After a few weeks of testing I came to the conclusion that it is a good safety shoe, but if you can add a gel insole it will help even more, as after a few hours it starts to get tired like any other... but it has a soft soldier. If possible, choose half a size smaller or even 1 size smaller as the model is large.
Should be breathable but I still have wet feet. Looks nice and does the job so in the end I will recommend it because all of them safety trainers have some good and bad points.

Due to unforseen circumstances, I have not used these in work yet. I have warn them for a day as just shoes and they are comfy and feel good. Though they are a little larger then I expected.Usually a 10 wide would be a good fit so the sizing on these must be a little bigger. That's not a bad thing just something to know.
Love the style, light on your feet and comfortable but still lets the rain in slightly so if your looking for waterproof these won’t 100% won’t be the ones for you as my socks still get a bit damp
reviews.review_title: Great shoes but not quite waterproof

reviews.review_content: True to size. Comfortable and stylish

Very comfortable shoe. Padding in the soul is lovely and plush. I would say it needs more breathability as my feet get incredibly sweaty in these shoes. Although that happens to me for most shoes so your mileage may vary
Beautiful. So sorry.
Nice and comfortable but front of the shoe so wide could be smaller makes your feet look massive

Very comfy good looking and great quality very light considering they are safety shoe the only 2 problems I have with them is firstly when you take them off after working in them all day your feet can smell so I would recommend getting some insoles to stop this happening and the second problem which I would say is the most important thing to mention is the shoes can be very slippery even when it is not wet so do think carefully before you buy them but apart from that they are a great shoe

They are very durable and comfy. Honestly before these I was wearing normal trainers and steel toe cap boots and now that I’ve started wearing these they are definitely more comfortable than my normal trainers. They look really nice and they are comfy like I said so instead of having trainers and steel toe cap boots at work with me I can just bring these and I’ll be fine.
Very comfortable shoes and very lightweight.
Comfortable and look good 👍🏼

Very happy with these for work. I've had them for 3 weeks so far, and I'm so happy with how comfy they are. My work boots was killing my feet, so opted for these, and I'm so glad I did. I deliver furniture for a living, so needed something comfy and light, but also protective, and these are perfect. Will definitely buy these again when eventually needed.
Maybe .5 larger in size than I expected but otherwise very comfortable.
Purchased these a while ago , they get worn for 44 hours a week and still got plenty of life left in them ,  much better than bootsLightweight and comfortable
Being wide in foot this trainer in wide fit really fits well. The best work trainer I have ever purchased. Recommend to any trade.

reviews.review_content: Bearly lasted 6 months of light use

Only had these trainers for 2 months and have barely worn them. The sole is made of foam which is quite comfortable out of the box but has no real longevity. I've had adidas trainers with similar soles which have worn and lasted much better than these Skechers and at a fraction if the price.

Sole is very disposable material. It already started loosing its grip in 2 months time and only been worn 3 times a week. Seems duplicate product to me as I am using Skechers for 7 years now.Amazon should take notice of this issue.
reviews.review_title: This product is not upto quality standards

reviews.review_content: Sorry no picture as returned but product supplied was a big let down. Meant to be for my sons birthday. It wad a sketchers slip on shoe with while heels, not at all what my 37yr old son would wear. Big disappointment 😞
Had less than 3 months and already a hole has appeared above the toe.

I don't normally bother writing product reviews but this is necessary. I bought these in good faith after reading what was mostly positive reviews. Unfortunately 10 months later and mine are unwearable! I've owned a fair few pairs of trainers over the years with the majority lasting me at least 2-3 years before I bin them, these however have failed prematurely. The heels have collapsed, the soles have started sinking to one side and the Skechers logo on both trainers have fallen off. I've got a similar pair of Puma trainers that I've climbed multiple mountains in North Wales where I live that are over 2 years old now and have outlived these very poorly made Sketchers.
reviews.review_title: Completely unwearable after less than a year of owning.

reviews.review_content: Rubbish quality, developed a hole in the toe after 6 weeks. Can't return.

Terrible

reviews.review_content: Had these for a little while, and they've got both the good and the bad you always get from Sketchers. Extremely comfortable to wear, but wear out very quickly. Would only recommend for very occasional wear. Updated review: Now unwearable, had maybe three to four months of standard wear to get to that point.
reviews.review_title: Same issue as all sketchers. Comfortable, but not durable.

reviews.review_content: I've been buying Skechers for the last few years now and most have been decent. This pair I boughtin November last year 2023, at first I thought these were the best to date.. really lightweight as most are etc however these are no good in winter wet weather as let the wet just off medium cut grass  in really easy.. these only useful on warm dry summer days and for the price I would expect better from this long running company.

Came quickly and sensible exterior packaging, and look OK.  But they have polystyrene inserts forced inside the shoes to keep the shape.  The laces, so precisely inserted, basically have to be removed in order to get the polystyrene inserts out, and pulling these inserts out also pulls the insoles out.  They are supposed to be a UK 11 but are very tight across the toes.  Would probably need to replace the insoles with thinner ones to save toes from being squashed.  Disappointing for Skechers.  UPDATE.  Looking inside the sneakers they are printed as UK 9.  Being returned to Amazon.
I ordered half size larger than usual but these were still not extra wide and looking of Skechers site relaxed fit is classed as medium, not even wide fit
reviews.review_title: NOT extra wide just relaxed fit

reviews.review_content: Shoes narrow fitting. Returned for refund
These trainers are super comfortable - but give me static shocks everywhere I go!  I gave up wearing them after a few days as I was sick of being shocked.....

They are not as comfortable as my last pair of sketchers.  I have had to buy some insoles. I am very disappointed,  because  they are not cheap, and I cannot afford to buy a pair every month. I am on my feet at work  all day at work...so comfortable footwear are a must. Fingers crossed that the insoles I have just bought make them more comfortable.

Usually a very good pair of trainers . Maybe I have got a defective pair . The side on the ankle support is rubbing my ankle . Think the support has come away from the trainers side . Otherwise quick delivery .
No support for your ankles, not robust at all. May as well have ordered a pair of slippers to walk around outside in.
not as stretchy as usual and my foot was sore after wearing once ...put me off skechers . Unfortunately can t return as worn

reviews.review_content: Sketchers have a habit of being very comfortable but you pay for that comfort by losing longevity. In my case always back heel starts to tear little hole.

At the time of purchase, I paid about £35 for these. They are okay however there is one issue that is really casuing me issues... the static build up and resulting shocks. The soles are not rubber, they are much softer and when I use my home treadmil, it builds up such a high amount of static that it gives me an unpleasant show when i inevitably touch something metal. This is a pain because I bought them for the gym or going on my treadmil.
reviews.review_title: Watch out for static electricity shocks!

reviews.review_content: I'd heard all the hype so I bought these with a voucher I'd been given. They're okay, nothing more.
Two small not wide enough

Great shoe, really comfortable and think I'd buy again the only downside would be the fabric on top wore away a bit too soon, it's too light a fabric. I've noticed that the fabric seems to be coming away when the black top meets the white sole and the side of the shoe as well. Really comfortable for the bottom of the foot but I'd look for something more sturdier on top.

reviews.review_content: So they didn't suit me at all.  People with narrower feet should find them comfortable.

These are my go to trainers. Very comfortable, very light weight with good build quality. They also have a very clean look to unlike many other trainers that are very busy.Only downside is that they the grip does wear down with regular use. I buy as many pairs as I can when they are in stock, hopefully Skechers keep on making them.

I bought these bad boys 3 years and 4 months ago for my lockdown supermarket job, and I still have them now. They are the comfiest closed toe shoes I've ever had.At first I was wary of them because they looked 'ugly' compared to the sneakers I used to wear.I have naturally wide feet, and the toe box is wide for trainers and didn't squeeze my toes compared to other shoes I've worn. The fabric top is forgiving and doesn't feel contricting.The sole is thick, soft (you can press your finger into it significantly) and perhaps curved, so walking is like a rolling motion for the shoes. My feet muscles don't have to work as hard when I wear them because there is so much cushioning and support. This may be a plus or minus depending on the person. They don't make a lot of sound even when running. They feel like a toned down version of walking on clouds.These shoes are great for standing for long periods, hiking, running, sports... I do not recommend them for cycling because the soles will just get torn up by metal pedals like mine did.I even took these backpacking. When they were in my backpack I could squash them down.They're my all rounded shoes. The only downsides I can think of are that they're not conventionally aesthetic, and not waterproof. I would buy them again for sure.
Great fit and extremely comfortable. Very good value for money can recommend.
Excellent value for money and very comfortable and light.

Bought these as I have a bad knee and was hoping for some support for walking around at work to help absorb the shock.These are so comfy and light weight, they stretch to fit your foot, they do make your feet sweat a bit, but pop in some odour eaters and they`re fine. Not for outdoor use though, I work in offices. Better than trainers and unless you really look, they work with wearing a suit. Great idea too that you can wash them, in a cold wash. More than happy. When they wear out, I`ll be ordering more if they are available.
Great fit, true to size. Very comfortable.

reviews.review_content: I ordered the XL and my waist is around 35-36" - the size was fine. The design of these trunks is good, with a nice thick Black cord (on the Red I ordered) and nice black zips on each pocket. However, I noticed that some colour had come off onto my beach towel after sitting a while and this was reinforced when I washed them the first time - the colour came out and seeped onto my other clothes in the same wash. Luckily my 'Under Armour' T-Shirt (expensive!) was turned inside-out, so the red dye only went on the reverse side. The worst thing about these though is that the mesh lining inside is a little bit loose. A few times, my 'under-carriage' popped onto the side through the mesh lining and anyone passing in front of me, could get a glimpse of my gonads (sorry). So constant 'adjustments' needed to be made to keep things from falling to the side, so to speak! Anyway, if they manage to sort out the over-dye problem (it is a vivid colour) and reinforce the mesh-lining inside, they'd have a better product. Also, the trunks tend to 'balloon' when you hit some heavy water (like waves) - probably due to the closed zipped pockets.
The garment arrived promptly. When the garment is held it is apparent its cheaply made. Have not had a chance to try them out yet
OK

Finding suitable footwear when you have both large feet and fallen arches has been a constant challenge for me. However, my quest for comfortable and supportive shoes took a positive turn when I discovered the Under Armour pair that has truly been a game-changer.Comfort and Fit: These shoes instantly impressed me with their impeccable comfort and ideal fit. As someone with larger feet, it's often frustrating to find shoes that feel just right, but these exceeded my expectations. The cushioning and padding inside create a cloud-like sensation, making each step a delight. No matter how long I wear them, I haven't experienced any discomfort, thanks to their well-designed fit.Arch Support: The standout feature of these shoes, particularly for individuals with fallen arches, is the exceptional arch support they offer. The design of the Under Armour shoes effectively cradles the feet and provides much-needed stability. This support has significantly reduced the strain on my arches, granting me relief I didn't think was possible from a pair of shoes.Durability: Beyond the immediate comfort and support, these shoes have showcased remarkable durability. Despite my active lifestyle and frequent use, they have held up incredibly well. The choice of high-quality materials in their construction gives me confidence that they'll continue to be a reliable companion for a long time, solidifying the value of this investment.Style: While the primary focus is on comfort and support, these shoes don't compromise on style either. With a modern and sleek design, they effortlessly complement various casual outfits. While not the flashiest option, they strike a balance between aesthetics and functionality.In conclusion, the Under Armour shoes tailored for larger feet and fallen arches have proven to be a godsend for me. Their unmatched comfort, outstanding arch support, and impressive durability set them apart. It's refreshing to finally find a solution that caters to my specific needs without sacrificing style. I wholeheartedly recommend these shoes to anyone in a similar situation – Under Armour has undoubtedly earned my trust with this remarkable product.

I have owned and reviewed several water shoes on Amazon, but this is the first pair from Supmix I have owned.I have not had the chance to use these in the real world just yet, but I will be doing so shortly as I do a lot of paddle boarding and open-water swimming. However, I have tried them on in the house, and taken a shower wearing them to see how they coped in water.First off, these are pretty much a standard design for excellent but cheap water shoes. Next, they do have drainage holes (which you don't always get) which makes using them for paddle boarding (my main reason for owning these types of shoes) a much more enjoyable experience. They are also made with not too much cushioning (which makes them dry quicker, no one wants damp shoes to wear the next day), which again can be an issue with other types of water shoes I have tried. They have a good rubber sole which will be handy for wet rocks, etc. They also have a tab on the tongue to help you pull them on and off your feet which is helpful when they are wet. They are good value for money, at the time of review in March 2023, they are £24.99. How robust they are, remains to be seen though.The only reason I have given 4 stars and not 5 stars, is that the sizing is way out. I would recommend you go a size smaller than you think. Even taking into consideration that you wear these barefooted, you still need to go a size smaller. Other than that, I can still recommend these to you.

reviews.review_content: The strap goes on really easily. Unfortunately it comes off just as easy. Literally a stong tug from a sleeve cuff and the strap comes away from the watch. Lose a €400 watch over a €3.50 strap? I stopped using it after two days. I should have bought a better one.

These straps are good but it’s a shame that the pins are faulty, which means the strap keeps coming off of the watch. Even when you put the watch on, or off, the pins pop out. I actually dropped my watch on one occasion, as the straps popped out. Luckily, I was on soft ground, so my watch wasn’t damaged.If they change the pins, the straps would be great. Until that point, I would avoid.
reviews.review_title: Straps kept coming off and I nearly damaged my watch

reviews.review_content: This watch strap pops off for like literally no reason.  Over the last month I've counted the times my watch has just randomly fallen off. 37. 37 times  in a single month.Needless to say this product is beyond useless.
reviews.review_title: Want to loose your watch? But this strap!

reviews.review_content: The pins that come from the strap do not keep the strap attached to the watch it pops out randomly making it totally useless sadly.
The straps are fine but the metal bars to keep it in place are too small so a slight pull will dismantle.
Did not fit my smartwatch :( found them having misplaced them after delivery only to find they do not fit my Samsung smartwatch 😞
I searched on Amazon for straps for my smart watch by brand and it suggested the is and the pins were too small

the lugs detach with even the slightest bit of force, got for Venu 2 and can’t use for even wearing about the house never mind exercise, shame as the material of the actual strap feels like good quality and is comfy
Good job it was a non  return refund as they were just fit for the bin
Loved the way it feelsBut it has broken with in 3 days

Nice strap quality…. However i only received 3 of the “pins” required to accommodate both straps….(there should be 2 for each)And every time I try to take the watch off the pin pops out …. And sometimes when I am just walking it falls apart

Im not sure if its the pins in the strap or the strap itself but I find myself having to reattach my watch strap to the face numerous times. once on it is very comfortable but with the way it comes apart there is a risk to loosing the watch.I would not buy this product again
reviews.review_title: Ping off more than stay on

reviews.review_content: Very comfotable strap. Maybe I was unlucky but almost twice lost my Garmin Venu2s plus watch in the street a sprung away by itself and watch body falling to the ground.Strap kept pinging off by itself, maybe springs not strong enough to keep in place, or fixture bars a tad bit short than required. I notice the fixture bars on the original Garmin straps are thicker. I know this from attempting to squeeze the originals in

I measured and remeasured my watch to make sure I had the correct width band and still these did not fit. I installed as per the instructions and within minutes the band had come loose via the clips. Shame as the actual fabric of the bands were soft and stretchy.
reviews.review_title: Item returned as not fit for purpose

reviews.review_content: The actual strap is comfortable and of good quality. There were a few frays of fabric but these can be removed easily.The pins however are the weakest links. As soon as you try to remove your watch or place it on - the pins pops out...watch falls to the floor. I have tried different pins that were supplied...all with the same result.Shame...this could have been a good quality item if not let down by its weakest link.Can't recommend and resorted to Garmin's original silicone strap for the time being.
reviews.review_title: Let down by the weakest link...

reviews.review_content: Pins constantly detach multiple times of day. Stitch quality isn’t great, it snagged easy leaving pulls.

I purchased these straps May 2023Were very nice, easy to fit. Even though I had to have them at the tightest fit with having small wrists.But the elastic has become loose after 2 months, rather disappointed about this as they are very comfortable, no irritation on the wrist. Sorry so 2 star's for 2 months of wear ...

I've a Garmin venu 2. Was keen to try these for wearing on my ankle at work. But the bar pops off about once a day, especially if stretching the strap to put the watch on even my wrist. Plucked the fabric quite easily too.
Great, comfortable strap, but the connecting pins are very weak. Not a great fit and keep popping out causing my watch to fall off. Not great.For Garmin Vivoactive 4s.
it fell apart after few days of use.. also they arrived with no metal bits to mount onto the watch , the listing is only for the strap! the quick release mechanism is not included!

Like many of the reviews I've read here, I got one of these because I was sick of having a silicone strap that irritates the skin, meaning I keep having to swap the wrist, they both become more and more irritated not having long enough to recover and I just want to take the watch off.I have a Garmin Venu 2 Plus, so I needed a 20mm strap to replace the above mentioned silicone one.This strap feels nice to wear - in fact, going from constantly irritated and itchy skin to barely noticing it's on my wrist has been fantastic. It stretches enough (a blessing for someone that has large hands), is easily adjustable and looks like it'll last - even if not, they're cheap enough to buy a couple of replacements after a year or two.The downside is the metal bars supplied with the straps. For the first couple of days, the bar would come loose from the watch - luckily for me, while I was at my desk or adjusting it. It did once come loose while I was sleeping too. The bars seems to be long enough, but I mean, we're talking millimeters, so I may be wrong on that.I cut a bar out from my old silicone watch strap and tried that in this strap, lo-and-behold, the strap no longer becomes loose at the first sign of adjustment or smallest amount of pressure.So what that probably means is the spring in the supplied bars are too light or maybe they're a mm or so too short. It wasn't just one bar that was the problem, you're supplied with 8 (or at least I was). I tried 4 different ones and they all would come loose easily.Would I buy these again? Maybe, the metal bars being a factor and having to think about whether i'd need to spend more money just to get some better quality/accurate ones means i'm on the fence as of writing this.

Fabric is comfortable and seems to have eased the soreness caused by the original silicone band on my garmin. I can now also wear my garmin around my ankle at work to more accurately track my steps however....the pin/connector is fairly flimsy and does pop off easily when removing or putting on the watch which can be annoying. Overall, ok for the price but maybe worth paying a bit more for a sturdier product
The straps feel goog quality and would have been comfortable for my son to wear! However they where not compatible with the watch I had. You also got 5 pins.

The strap itself but the spring bars are either weak or slightly to short, any pressure on the bars, either from pulling on the strap or pressing on the bar itself it will snap out of the watch itself. I had to purchase extra bars elsewhere to keep it secure
reviews.review_title: Work well but the spring bars are weak

reviews.review_content: Comfortable watch strap ordered 16mm width, but unfortunately wouldn't fit my kahuna watch 1mm too wide. I used a file to adjust width now fits perfectly.

At first glance it watch strap looked pretty decent but then after I took it off and went to put it back on the clip on one side kept coming off.The type of material snags and pulls easily. My watch recently got caught in our wired fence. The clips aren’t that great and it just came off my wrist without me noticing. I then had to waste a whole day looking for my watch, as I wasn’t sure when it had came off.Definitely would not buy again
Do the job as temporary replacements
Lovely watch bracelets but had to return the straps as they did not fit my Smart watch ID208 BT. Did get a refund.
Every time you take on or off.  Loosens slightly which is irritating, but Overall good quality
Would have been perfect if the watch strap material hadn't started fraying after a few days.
reviews.review_title: Frayed after just a few days of wear

reviews.review_content: These straps are nice and comfortable,fitting is easy .... but, for my watch the pin slots in the strap ends are the opposite sides for the cut outs in my watch! So they don't fit. So, do I send them back or modify them? At the price it is not worth sending them back. I cut the required slots, just 1mm wide, to fit the original watch pins. This is fiddly but luckily I have the tools and machinery to do it and fine measuring equiptment. Easy job if you have the tools.Now fitted I am very pleased with the straps, once adjusted you wouldn't know you have a watch on your wrist, or where ever you care to wear it 😁.
reviews.review_title: Good but needed a mod to make them fit.

reviews.review_content: Bought the straps to replace my original Garmin Venu Sq strap. As the original strap was snapping I needed something quickly. As with all amazon orders it was delivered quickly in good packaging.It was easy enough to replace the strap but it was awkward reducing the size of the strap once it was on my wrist. If I didn't make the strap wider when taking the watch off to shower, the strap would snap off from the watch. The quick release pins weren't long enough.As the strap kept coming away from watch I've had to buy a new one. The elasticated version wasn't for me and I didn't want my watch face being damaged with it keep landing on the floor.
I find the strap to be more comfortable than the plastic one that came with my Samsung watch and easier to put on/take off
A bit fiddly to fit at first. straps seem to good quality and feel comfortable on my wrist. a good buy at a very good price
Nice elasticated/ stretchy straps which are much easier to take on and off than the original buckle and hole style.

I'm using the 20mm strap with a Garmin Instinct 2S, and it fits great.The pins that come with it feel a bit flimsy, and they give you way more than is needed for 2 straps so I am anticipating at least one is going to break! However, once the strap attaches (and it's very easy to fit) it feels great. Having the elastic strap means my watch fits much better than the stock strap, and my watch hasn't slipped since I swapped to this strap.Would order again in a different colour!
reviews.review_title: Just what I needed - comfy, easy to fit, and a great price

reviews.review_content: Comfortable, fit my Garmin forerunner well, easy to adjust.

Refused to pay the ridiculous amount for a replacement Casio strap so used these (you get two) Not perfect but solved the problem eventually after fiddling with it. They came with the pins too. Happy I saved £40
It's very flexible and comfortable

Bought two multipacks if straps as we had the original rubber straps that were causing skin issues. These straps are extremely comfy and easily resized. I have the Venu and got the 20 mm straps and they fit really well however the pins pop out of the strap seat on the watch face now and again, few times a day. I recommend the straps but the pins aren't that great so might be buying new pins somewhere. Good value for the money paid though and really easy to install
reviews.review_title: Comfy, breathable but clips not great

reviews.review_content: I was pleasantly surprised at how well made and easy these were to fit. For the price they are great quality and well made. I can see these lasting and being well worth the money until they get too worn or dirty. Having elasticated watch straps make it far easier to put my watch on and take it off. The last strap was fiddly and awkwardly my Apple Watch. Time will tell on how long it lasts as I do remove my watch on a regular basis. The straps are very comfortable and easily adjustable. Two straps at a great price - Highly recommended
reviews.review_title: Easy to fit and comfortable to wear

reviews.review_content: These straps are excellent .If your fed up buying watches with tiny sized straps then these straps are for you .Easy to fit with good quality elasticated material strap .Plastic end links with quick release spring bars.Easy to adjust , super comfy and so far the elastic material hasn’t stretched out of shape, so once you’ve adjusted it to fit it stays that size . Easy to get on & off.Be great if they come up with a range of NATO style colour options .Overall 10/10 …

Very comfortable watch straps purchased as a gift as rubber straps were causing irritation. These perfectly fit Samsung Gear S3 smartwatch and look smart and stylish. Great value as you get 2 straps in the pack and also additional pins should you need them. Easy to add on watch and easily resized with no annoying Velcro to catch dust and dirt.
reviews.review_title: Comfortable and easy to add to watch

reviews.review_content: Have bought several of the silicone strap they just dont seem to last.So thought i would give these a try. So far so good comfy and good fit

I loved these straps as soon as I got them, I hated the horrible plastic strap that came with the watch which irritated my skin, these I can wear tightly but comfortably, these are really good value  perfectly and easily fitted to the watch itself, completely waterproof that dries really quickly.  I have the impression that the great build of these straps will last a good amount of time
reviews.review_title: Can be pulled tight for close and comfortable security

reviews.review_content: All in all nice band, comfortable.Only issue was I ordered 2 bands, and it was only shipped with 3 quick release bars, and I need 4.Tethering on 5 stars except for the missing bar.Update:There was a second little bag hiding on me with 3 other quick release bars.So there is 6 in total, 2 spares!Updating to 5 star!
The item arrived promptly - but I do subscribe to prime. This item looks okay. Not put them on a watch yet. Don’t see any problems as they are adjustable, they also come with the pins for assembly.

Decent quality and Price. Bought for a new cheap smart watch. As a well fitted strap keeps the sensors in place. So many folks moan about defective watches then have them dancing around there wrists with a bad loose strap. Non of that guff with this bad boi.

I have a Venu2S and the strap that came with it, although matching the face (very light blue) and I can’t fault it, I found was either a fraction too tight or too loose, I couldn’t get it right.  A friend recommended these and I bought these two designs because at Christmas I changed the watch face to a Christmas scene with a lot of red in it, and the red strap went perfectly. Now back to the strap that colour matches the face design I prefer.As far as practicality is concerned, I use the watch when running and it stays put, I.e. the strap doesn’t get loose as you run.  I also wear it when showering afterwards, I’ve worn it when swimming, and although the fabric gets wet it dries so quickly I’ve never had a wet sleeve/cuff because of it.You get the pins you need to attach it to the watch with it, and they are so easy to use, not fiddly at all.  Just make sure you measure your wrist to get the right size for you, and whatever watch you have, check the pin length you need accurately in mm.
reviews.review_title: Fits really well, no more strap that is either too tight or too loose

reviews.review_content:

    I bought these as the watch strap that came with the watch was giving me a rash after using these I get no rashes and then are so comfortable. I like that they go bigger and smaller to very adjustable. I'm looking in to getting more for my holiday
