The pants are 4 star. Good, comfortable, not as soft as I expected, but that will probably make them more durable.... I subtracted a star because I was sent the wrong color. I tried them on, liked them, and ripped off the tag--it was a little dark, the pants looked Navy colored, but in daylight, I saw they were black pants...kind of a bummer, but I don't think I can return them since I ripped the tag.
reviews.review_title: Pretty Good Pants - wrong color delivered

reviews.review_content: Die Performance Pants für Herren sind zweifellos bequem und bieten eine angenehme Elastizität, was für den ganzen Tag am Arbeitsplatz oder in der Freizeit wichtig ist. Ich schätze besonders den Komfort und die Flexibilität dieser Hosen. Die Passform entspricht genau den angegebenen Größen, was eine angenehme Überraschung war, da dies bei Online-Kleidungskäufen nicht immer der Fall ist.Jedoch war ich enttäuscht über den Preis für eine einzelne Hose. Zwei Sterne Abzug wegen des Preises für ein einzelnes Kleidungsstück sind für mich gerechtfertigt. Trotz des angenehmen Tragegefühls und der guten Passform konnte ich keinen übermäßigen Unterschied zu ähnlichen Hosen anderer Marken feststellen, die zu einem deutlich günstigeren Preis erhältlich sind.Die schnelle Lieferung war definitiv ein Pluspunkt. Ich erhielt meine Bestellung rechtzeitig und die Verpackung war in Ordnung.Alles in allem würde ich sagen, dass die Performance Pants Herren eine gute Wahl sein können, wenn der Preis keine entscheidende Rolle spielt. Für Personen, die bereit sind, etwas mehr für ihre Hosen auszugeben und Wert auf Komfort und Elastizität legen, könnten diese Hosen eine Überlegung wert sein. Jedoch denke ich, dass es vergleichbare Alternativen auf dem Markt gibt, die möglicherweise kostengünstiger sind und ähnlichen Komfort bieten. Daher meine Bewertung mit drei Sternen.
reviews.review_title: Komfortabel und elastisch, aber zu hoher Preis

reviews.review_content: Look like decent pants. However, this is the second time they reversed the waist and length size. Can’t really gauge how they fit.

Obwohl ich drei Modelle in einer einheitlichen Größe bestellt habe, fallen diese alle unterschiedlich aus. Eine passt, zwei zu klein. Ansonsten qualitativ und optisch sehr ansprechende Hosen, wenn nur das Größenthema nicht wäre. Merkwürdig.

Ja die Hose ist bequem, ja sie fühlt sich fast an wie eine Jogginghose, nur sieht sie eben auch so aus (habe die hellgraue bestellt). Damit kann man leider nicht ins Büro gehen. Dazu kommt dass sie meines Erachtens für eine Chino fürs Büro zu eng geschnitten ist (und ich hab früher Skinmy Jeans getragen), damit fällt man im Büro echt auf. Für meinem Zweck (Arbeitshose) leider ungeeignet, geht zurück.

Ich habe bei Jeans und anderen Hosen meist Größe W32 oder W33. Auch diese Hose habe ich in Größe 33 bestellt, jedoch zurückgeschickt, da sie viel kleiner ausfällt. Ich würde vermuten, dass mir bei diesem Produkt vermutlich Größe W35 passen würde? Die Qualität macht aber einen guten Eindruck.
Die Hose war von der Passform relativ gut. Allerdings war die Qualität echt nicht die beste. Hat sich sehr billig angefühlt, nach sehr viel Plastik. Dadurch hat sie auch ziemlich geglänzt.
Vorgeschlagene Größe passt gut

An sich eine sehr schöne Hose und gerade auch was den Strechfaktor betrifft eigentlich sehr geil. Auch am Design der Hose her gibt es nichts zum meckern. Und auch die Größen stimmen.ABER meiner Meinung nach ist die Hose an den Waden doch ein wenig sehr eng geschnitten was dann die Hose doch etwas mehr nach Jogginghose aussehen lässt.Und da ich die Hose gerne auch zu etwas feineren Anlässen anziehen will ist das der Punkt gewesen warum ich die Hose am Ende doch zurückgeschickt habe.
reviews.review_title: "Kleinigkeiten" haben mich am Ende leider nicht überzeugt

reviews.review_content: Diese Hose hat mir gar nicht gepasst. Hab mir einiges erhofft aus der Vorstellung was Bequemlichkeit angeht, aber leider ist sie an den Waden viel zu eng und am Hintern zu locker. Eine unangenehme Falte im Schritt lässt das ganze dann ziemlich wüst aussehen. Schade aber der Schnitt passt einfach nicht.

These are super stretchy, but look more like tracksuit material than suit/ trouser material.  A bit shiny and the fabric hangs really loosely.The ones I tried were unfortunately massively oversize - the 38 inch waist actually measured about 39.5.

Die Performance Pants für Herren sind eine hervorragende Kombination aus Stil und Funktionalität. Als jemand, der sowohl Wert auf Ästhetik als auch auf Komfort legt, bin ich von diesen Hosen beeindruckt.Material:Das Material ist ein entscheidender Faktor für diese Hosen. Es ist eine Mischung aus Baumwolle, Nylon und Spandex, die eine perfekte Balance zwischen Weichheit, Haltbarkeit und Flexibilität bietet. Die Verwendung von hochwertigen Stoffen wie Nylon und Spandex sorgt für eine ausgezeichnete Dehnbarkeit und Bewegungsfreiheit, was sie ideal für den aktiven Alltag macht.Passform:Die Slim-Fit-Passform ist modern und schmeichelhaft, ohne dabei die Bewegungsfreiheit einzuschränken. Die Hosen sitzen bequem und bieten gleichzeitig eine schlanke Silhouette, die sowohl im Büro als auch in der Freizeit gut aussieht.Preis:Obwohl der Preis für einige Modelle etwas höher sein kann, reflektiert er die Qualität und die Leistungsfähigkeit des Produkts. Angesichts der Langlebigkeit und Vielseitigkeit der Hosen ist das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis gerechtfertigt.Fazit:Die Performance Pants für Herren sind eine ausgezeichnete Wahl für Männer, die eine Hose suchen, die sowohl stilvoll als auch funktional ist. Das Material ist top, die Passform ist ideal und der Preis steht in einem guten Verhältnis zur gebotenen Qualität und Leistung. Ich kann diese Hosen jedem empfehlen, der auf der Suche nach einer vielseitigen Hose ist, die sowohl für den Beruf als auch für die Freizeit geeignet ist.
reviews.review_title: Stil trifft Funktion: Performance Pants für Herren

reviews.review_content: Die Passform der Hose ist wie erwartet und der Stoff sehr angenehm. Die Verarbeitung lässt auch nicht zu wünschen übrig und farblich ebenfalls Bild-getreu.Wie schon in anderen Rezensionen angegeben sieht man Abdrücke, wie Handy/ Geldbeutel/ Schlüssel (es empfiehlt sich eine Unterbringung außerhalb der Hosentasche, wenn man das als störend erachtet) oder auch Falten von Hemden/ Shirts, die in die Hose gesteckt wurden oder auch Unterwäsche, sofern diese Falten schlägt, daher der eine Stern Abzug.Der Tragekomfort erinnert an eine Jogginghose, macht aber für den Alltag, je nach Kombination etwas schicker oder weniger Schick.An für sich eine gute Hose, die Bequemlichkeit mit sich bringt.

Die Stoff Stretch Hose hat mich positiv überrascht und verdient 4 von 5 Sternen. Die Farbechtheit und Robustheit sind beeindruckend - sie sieht auch nach längerer Tragezeit gut aus. Allerdings sollten Eltern mit kleinen Kindern aufpassen, da kleinste Fettabdrücke bereits auf dem Stoff sichtbar sind.Ich behandle diese Hose so vorsichtig wie meine Anzugshosen, um sie in gutem Zustand zu erhalten. Positiv ist, dass sie keine unangenehmen Gerüche anzieht.Der Stil der Hose kann problemlos mit klassischen Stoffhosen mithalten, und sie ist tatsächlich sehr anliegend. Der Nachteil ist, dass Schlüssel und Handy in der Hosentasche als Fremdkörper hervorstechen, weshalb ich sie woanders aufbewahre.Einen gut geformtes Gesäß bringen sie dafür richtig gut zur Geltung.Die Hose eignet sich eher für die Übergangszeiten, da sie etwas dicker ausfällt. Die Olive Farbe ist wirklich schön getroffen, und es sind keine Nahtfehler erkennbar.Insgesamt bietet die Stoff Stretch Hose eine gute Kombination aus Robustheit, Stil und Komfort. Ein idealer Begleiter für den Alltag, der mit einigen kleinen Einschränkungen dennoch zu überzeugen weiß.
reviews.review_title: Robuste und stilvolle Stoff Stretch Hose

reviews.review_content: An sich eine klasse Hose. Leider zwei mal Marine Blau bestellt, zwei mal Grau bekommen. Daher zurück. Habe jetzt direkt beim Hersteller bestellt. Vermutlich waren die Hosen bei Amazon falsch etikettiert.

Comprati per mio figlio che è alto e magro. Ottimi! Finalmente dei pantaloni che vestono bene sia in vita che come lunghezza. Oltretutto si lavano comodamente e non hanno bisogno di essere stirati. Essendo leggermente elastici sono anche molto comodi. Ne ho comprati altre due paia in due colori diversi.

Ich habe mich ein wenig in diese Hose verliebt. Die angegebene Größe passt perfekt und der Tragekomfort ist wirklich hervorragend. Der Stoff fühlt sich gut an und die Hose ist sauber verarbeitet. Die eng anliegende Hose in Verbindung mit dem gewählten Stoff sorgt für eine schicke Gesamtoptik. Somit lässt sich die Hose prima zu den verschiedensten Anlässen tragen.

reviews.review_content: True to size
Little bit too big, however lightweight and comfy in warm weather

UPDATE: These shorts are actually not well made at all. I purchased three pairs just over three months ago and all three are starting to fall apart. The drawstrings have become detached on two pairs with absolutely no way of re-threading and reattaching them and a hole has appeared out of nowhere in the third pair. Okay, I know these weren't the most expensive of shorts but still, you would expect them to last more than a month each on average!!These shorts are pretty well made but have two significant failings. The first is that the waist band and label are ridiculously harsh and therefore can be quite uncomfortable if worn directly on the skin, even after carefully removing the label. The second is that the drawstring is rubbish. I had one pair (of which I bought three!!) where the stitching at the back of the waistband came apart and the drawstring came out but as the channel for the cord is so ludicrously tight, it is impossible to get the original string (or any other string for that matter) threaded back through. Why would they make the cord in two parts like this? Surely it would make more sense to have one continuous drawstring!!
Very big sizing

I have several Powerblend Champion joggers of excellent quality and whilst the shorts are not power blend I would still expect good quality but these are awful and started return shortly after opening them. They are so bad, I did not even try them on. Not cheap but nasty. A real shame.
Load of rubbish
Don’t bother with this, it’s such bad quality. Don’t expect the same Champion quality you get from the shops!!
On the second time I wore these, I noticed the stitching had already began to come apart form the elasticated waist band.I would not recommend buying these.
Terrible quality, suspect that they are fake
Bought large but the shorts were huge. Returned the item but still waiting on confirmation of return and refund.
Leg opening very wide even with my rhino thighs!
reviews.review_title: Leg openings very big by comparison with my other Champion shorts

reviews.review_content: They are huge
Keine gute Qualität bei mir ist gleich das Band gerissen und auch so war die Shorts nicht so toll da ist man Anderes gewöhnt.
I bought these champion shorts in 2 colours and the quality was not very good as for the fit and comfort they were very poor. I  certainly would not recommend this product to anyone.

This is the third pair of champion shorts I have ordered after having to send the others back. Draw string not very strong and broke after one day in one of the pairs… it’s not a proper drawstring that goes all the way round it’s in 2 halves down to a seem at the back, clearly this is a flawed method. Why is it everything is such poor quality these days
Holes in the back of the short after less than 3 weeks. Not very durable at all. I am quite disappointed
Shorts far too large, look quite ridiculous. In perfect condition so would like to know options of return. Ordered another pair that never even came, would obviously like a solution to that as well

Der Versand dauerte ziemlich lange. Die Qualität der Hosen lässt zu wünschen übrig. Habe mir mehr erhofft aber bei dem Preis wohl naiv gewesen. Ich würde sie nicht nochmal bestellen. Tragen werde ich sie eventuell zum renovieren und arbeiten im Garten oder Haus, normal auf die Strass werde ich nicht anziehen da sie billig aussieht. These are more of home wear. Not for sports. Not dri fit.

I’ve been buying these gum shorts for years. They used to be made a lot better  these are supposed to be black - they’re dark blue. Very obvious next to my older black champion shorts.  They’re also tighter than before.
reviews.review_title: The material gets thinner every year

reviews.review_content: Ok. Might not be the original brand

reviews.review_content: I just wanted some soft cotton shorts to pull on in the morning to wear around the house but these turned out to be very disappointing and I don't like wearing them.Laundered once to see if they would get better, but no go.The tag (and the listing) says "100% Cotton" but they feel like a poorly made synthetic to the touch and are, for me, a little creepy.Like others have said, "you get what you pay for."Agreed.
Fades and shrinks upon first wash
reviews.review_title: Nice when you get it but NO

reviews.review_content: For the price can't complain.Would buy again.

Le short en jersey de Champion offre un confort décent et une esthétique décontractée qui en font un choix raisonnable pour les activités sportives ou les journées décontractées.La qualité du tissu en jersey est satisfaisante, offrant une légèreté agréable et une respirabilité convenable. Cela en fait un choix confortable pour les journées chaudes ou les séances d'entraînement décontractées.La marque Champion apporte une touche de style décontracté au short. Le logo discret ajoute une certaine authenticité, et la variété de couleurs disponibles permet de l'associer facilement à d'autres tenues sportives.La coupe est plutôt décontractée, offrant une grande liberté de mouvement. Cependant, pour certains, cela pourrait être perçu comme un peu trop ample, surtout si l'on préfère des coupes plus ajustées.La durabilité du short est acceptable. Il résiste bien aux lavages répétés, mais la qualité du jersey pourrait être renforcée pour garantir une plus grande longévité.En résumé, le short en jersey de Champion est un choix décent pour ceux qui recherchent un short décontracté et confortable. Cependant, il pourrait bénéficier d'une amélioration de la durabilité et de la coupe pour répondre aux préférences individuelles.
Nice shorts but they are not navy blue. More olive drab.
Die Shorts kommen aus den USA, fallen zwei Nummern zu groß aus und haben einen sehr weiten und langen Schnitt. Wie sie die Mexikaner in Filmen tragen.
reviews.review_title: Fallen zu groß aus, komischer Schnitt.

reviews.review_content: These were a perfect fit for my son and he’s tall. At first these looked great but after a couple weeks of wear and maybe 2 washes the waist band sewing is coming apart and the short fabric is separating from the waist band and the colour has faded significantly. Disappointed with the quality of this product.

They look much better quality in the listing photos. In person, they are cheap rough material with the most basic stitching just like a cheap no name pair of shorts. If I hadn’t paid a cheap sale price I would have returned these in disappointment.

The waistline is a little small so I would recommend getting a size bigger. They aren't the best quality. They already have little strings coming out. But for the price, they are ok and a good pair to wear at home.
Waitband elastic is exposed on the inside. (Not covered with fabric) looks cheap. Nit comfy.

The shorts are fine but just way to big. I am buying from Australia and the US sizes are so much bigger than the Australian sizes (already have previously bought these in Australia). It would be good if amazon detailed what size standard was being used in the advertisement.
reviews.review_title: US sizing way bigger than Australian sizing

reviews.review_content: Comfortable fit. Looks good. No complaints.
the dye seems to be coming out even after only 2 washes - red areas are appearing. not what I would expect with this known brand.
reviews.review_title: nice length for tall men (1.87m, comes to just above the knee)

reviews.review_content: God for the gym..bit bigger thank i expected but gives plenty of room to move about
Really nice pair of shorts but to big
Produit agréable à porter
Shorts are really nice and comfortable. However if you have pets you should know that pet hair stick to them badly. I’m constantly using the sticky roller on them!

Really comfortable material but the shorts are way too big. I’m 6’ with a 32” waste and I ordered a medium. I looked like I was drowning in the shorts they are way too baggie. Returned them and just ordered a small pair to see if that helps!*Update: just had the shorts arrive in a size small and they fit so much better! I’m about 165lbs, 32” waste if that helps anyone. After finding the right fit I have to say I would highly recommend these - they are really comfortable and a lightweight, thin material.

One of the best brands out there for mens sports gear as they are one of the few left out there where their size is actually what is says instead of having to buy a size up and hope for the best.  Have bought their stuff for years and it never disappoints these shorts are no exception and when they can be found in the sale it just makes it that little bit better.
I brought these for my husband and he likes them plus sizing is correct.  Not pricey either so that's a bonus.
Nice comfortable shorts.
Bought for my visits to the Gym, a bit baggy but otherwise great.So good I bought 2 pairs blue and black.Nice price too!
Looks great and great service

I like the fact that these shorts are actually made of cotton, unlike others on the market. Quality feels good but ask me again in a couple of years and I will tell you how they have coped with repeated washes.

My son liked these shorts so much that I’ve just ordered him another pair in a different colour! He says they are comfortable and a good fit. I got him size small and he is 15 years old and 5ft 8 inches tall.
Excellent fit and value for money
Fit great my son loves these will defo be buying again very happy customer
Excellent

reviews.review_content: The shoes look amazing advertised.. BUT, It came with no insoles? what kind of prank is that? half a job. Then, upon closer inspection, it has holes at the bottom of the shoe where dirt can get trapped inside and would be an absolute nightmare to clean. RETURNED.

Return is not an option because we no longer have the packaging and time does not allow us, but in the future we will think twice before buying online again.

Purchased these shoes for my 13yr son. We have had Geox before and they are very comfortable shoes, however after a week or so my son started to get blisters and the shoes just became unwearable. He's now resorted to wearing trainers in school.We have tried adding the additional heel support but the shoe is not working for him. Will have to resort to another style.
reviews.review_title: School shoes that rub on the heel!

reviews.review_content: Do not waste your hard earned money. Very poor quality product. Bought these shoes/trainers in September 2022, worn about 3 days a week on average. Today the glue has failed completely and I’ve got a gaping hole just to the side of the front end.This was my second pair of GEOX footwear, considering they’ve lasted 5 months, there won’t be a 3rd.Laughable…embarrassing quality
Falling apart after a month of light use. Waste of money.
The show upper got stained after the first wear with a water tide mark which has damaged the shoe leather

reviews.review_content: Geox are usually a very reliable brand but they have let themselves down with this model of shoe. The laces need replacing straight away as they are shiny and slippy and need doing up every 2 minutes. Then after 2 months of wearing the heal comes away from the sole and you are left with a huge hole. I won't be buying Geox again!
Good to start with had for 4 weeks and the  sole is now coming off. Poor quality which is a shame as they look good and are comfortable.

This must be the most uncomfortable shoe I have ever worn. I don't have slim feet, but I wouldn't say I have wide feet, normal trainers and other shoes always fit well. But there's something about the front section where the breathable holes are, it's very solid. I work 12 hours shifts on my feet in a busy hotel & restaurant. After about 6 hours I can feel my toes going numb, after 10 hours my big toes are aching. They remain numb when I get home and remove the shoes for a good few hours. I had to rub ibuprofen gel on my feet before going to sleep. I'm unsure why the front section of the insole is different from the rest. The outside of the shoe seems well made, maybe you will have better luck...

Looks great, formal. But one small but, it wears off within 4-5 month.I don't walk much - an hour a day maybe to work and back kinda and  3-4 hours in weekends.And got holes in both shoes at kinda same time.Maybe I am asking too much but I do expect shoes for that price range to last a bit longer.Mostly I repair the sole once a year. And all new shoes last 1 or more years.These shoes lasted for barely 5 month.So think twice before buying.
Sole came away from the upper after two years of light use. Nothing like previous Geox shoes I have had. Decline in quality.
Not so happy as small but will try and stretch
reviews.review_title: Making me weary of buying online

reviews.review_content: Shoes were much larger than expected.
Given the wrong size,  too large

I bought these shoes for work (Nurse in A and E). I wrought them exactly a year ago when drawn in by the Black Friday price. They look good. Maybe slightly less casual looking than the pictures may suggest.Anyway, it wasn’t long before I realised that I found these shoes to be extremely uncomfortable. I have high arches, no idea if that is why I found them so uncomfortable.I walk a lot at work and am on my feee all day and as such get the odd aches and pains. These shoes hurst my feet so much that I started to get pain in my left foot I thought that perhaps I had a stress fracture and was planning to see the doctor. I didn’t, it turned out it was a callous developed from the shoes.I have never had any problems with comfort with shoes before or ever had a callous. I was too cheap to spend any more money on what was supposed to be a deal, so I used some of my wife’s old sorbothane insoles. I can bear to wear them now, but my toes have a bit too much wiggle room.The problem now is that they are hard wearing. They are still going and I’m too cheap to buy something else until they wear out.

Der Schuh ist wirklich sehr bequem und sieht super aus. Ich habe ihn fast täglich getragen. Leider hat sich bereits nach einem Jahr die Sohle an der Hacke gelöst. Das ist wirklich sehr schade. I read reviews which stated the sole was hard on this range of shoes, but having taken delivery and inspected the sole it seems to have nice cushioning and is also good quality rubber. I am meant to be a size 12 but had to send the shoe back as it narrows at the toe and was a bit small for me. However, I am beginning to think I am more of a 12.5 so it might be worth ordering it anyway as it could be a genuine euro size 47 with a narrow toe being the main problem. The leather seems to be a nice quality and was soft at the sides. At the sale price definitely a nice casual shoe which seems to have a very good construction. I would have kept it but had to return due to size.

reviews.review_content: These Geox trainer shoes are both smart and comfortable. Great value, worth it for around £3-5 pounds. Stays white after a few washes.Not the most breathable, but does hold its shape.4/5.

reviews.review_content: It's not that I disliked the product; they looked and felt ok. I  just could not fasten them at the waist! All my other jeans (not Wrangler) are 35 or 36 waist, these are more like 33/34 waist in comparison. Trouble is if I order the larger waist size my rather good posterior would be swamped in baggy denim, what to do?
reviews.review_title: Order a waist size one above normal

reviews.review_content: Didn't like them

I am not sure that these are Wrangler jeans as sold. The material is thin and of poor quallity. Have had thes for three months and possibly worn no more that 6 times in that period. They fit very comfy and as i am normally 36 waist the 38 waiste fit quite loose as i know jeans do normally shrink slightly. I have noticed several fault in the material just recently as the pictures show, the material is pulling apart at the stiching. I have worn many pairs of jeans and they normally go on the knees not on the stiching. I would be interested in any coments from the seller before i take further steps with Amazon as these are not £32.50 jeans i paid for then let alone £52 what they are charging now.
reviews.review_title: Very poor quallity. material pulling apart

reviews.review_content: It was not good and I returned back, I got refund straightaway

Been a Wrangler fan for years. Always buy slim fit from a shop but these are more like a regular fit. Far too baggy. I wish that I'd sent them back. Waste of money!! This was the first time that I'd bought jeans online. I will never do it again, back to the shops in future.

So, these turned up with the expected Wrangler leather patches but no labels and no expected cardage quality seemed ok, colour too went to try them on almost crippled myself.. bought 40 waist to be a baggy fit usually a 38 these are closer to a 32.. Given the lack of usual labels etc, and I’ve been wearing Wranglers and Levi’s for 40 plus years I have some doubt as to the authenticity of these RETURNED

What is wrong with the world . Been buying these jeans for years with no problem. Now they have suddenly shortened the fly. You can get your hand in but like the monkey and the jar you can't get it out when you have a handful. Have to unbutton the jeans waist and pull the waist band open to get adequate access. Useless and eyebrow raising in public toilet. Won't buy again
Very thin and price has gone up by £11 per pair, won't be buying again.
Didn’t fit.
The jeans were extremely baggy and in no way were they slim fit! Very disappointing fitting.

After reading in the comments that these jeans "unfortunately" didn't have the stretch Levis offers... I thought yes, this is a sturdy cotton pair of jeans. I received a super stretch, not at all slim summer jeans that I fear will wear and tear as I intend to use this to work on the farm. It feels flimsy, thin... not at all as a pair of jeans. I guess these are coming from an Asian factory where the product is randomly picked from a pile by size, without looking at the product itself. I was unlucky...
reviews.review_title: I thought I was ordering a classic American Cowboy cotton jeans,,,

reviews.review_content: These were, until recently, 100% cotton.Great fit, wore well.Now very stretchy thanks to 1% elastane. Legs shrank 2" after 3 washes at 30C.After over 40 years of wearing wrangler texas, I've switched to Levi 501s. The only decent all cotton jeans on the market.

Being 60+ and aware of the issue of jeans and the mature man, I did my research prior to making this purchase and still got it wrong.  Furthermore, shops seem to have little other than slim-fit, production line stressed jeans that I can't stand and I was looking for natural or mid-rise waist, comfort in the hips and crotch and a dark shade of denim.  The stretch was a bonus.  Wrangler market this as mid-rise together with the aforementioned comfort factors.  The waist was very low, showing my boxers back and front and seemed even in height all around.  Normally, jeans are somewhat higher at the back.  Not these.  There was also a gap in the back waistband centre which would need a belt to close it.  This is a real pity as the colour was great and the leg length and slight taper were nice but the fit in crucial areas, for me, was all wrong, especially the waist height.  I would not describe these jeans as mid-rise; they were more like low-rise.  They were returned for a refund and a lesson was learned.  There are certain things that must be tried on before purchase:- headgear, footwear and now jeans as the sizing seems inconsistent and costly shipping is not worth buying this way unless you know the model for sure.

I originally ordered these in a 31 which duly arrived and looked fine, and although a little tight they fitted well so I ordered another pair but in a 32 for a little more 'comfort' - these are the jeans this review is for. They arrived fine but I could see immediately that the 'Stonewash' finish was different and not as I expected or wanted. I tried them on and found that the 32 'Stretch' was overlarge on me and would have probably required a belt if I kept them. Wondering about the difference in fit from the first pair I checked them over again to find that the first pair were in fact 'Regular Fit' and not the 'Stretch' I had originally ordered - I was happy with them so didn't really look at the labels. Although this was a dispatch error (easy I guess when the labelling is almost identical) I decided to keep them and actually ordered another pair in 32 Regular which came down in exactly the same Stonewash finish and fitted as expected. The 'stretch' pair in a slightly dodgy blue were returned without problem, which is as well, as picking clothing online which is available in so many variations can lead to unwitting errors in ordering.

Description says closure as button and then zip. All jeans have a button on top and I have not seen any without one, so what this should mean here is that under the big button you get smaller buttons or zip.

The fit of these jeans was great, modern and slim without being skinny. Unfortunately the material was more like womens jeggings. While you may get away with them in summer they are too thin for the colder months and I wouldn't expect them to last nearly as long as my usual 511s. Lesson learnt.
Supposed to be slim fit but all baggy on the legs,not very impressed at all

The jeans are only black on the surface. If you snag them at all, and pull a tiny thread, it’s white!To put it mildly, that stands out on black jeans.I’ve had to resort to a black marker pen to hide the snags as best I can.These have not been made from reels of died cotton, nor even soaked in die once made. I can only think that the denim fabric was just sprayed with black die.Very disappointing quality.

Although sold as 'Texas' they are definitely nowhere the same quality as my other pairs of these jeans. These are a sort of almost stretchy cotton, not quite as long and much thinner. I've bought 'Texas' Wranglers for many, many years and am very disappointed. These are called 'Texas Contrast' so may be it's the design but if they are lower quality than 'Texas' then it should be made clear in the description.
reviews.review_title: Poor quality compared to my older pairs of these

reviews.review_content: Doesn’t fit well. Zipper shows

Bought the 38/32 wish I had got the 36/32They are a strange length between crotch and waist, too long so you need to pull them too far up to make them not hang down at the crotch.I’ve stuck them in the wardrobe in case I put on a couple of stone!Will stick to Levi’s in the future.
Product quality ok but size was a bit odd. Over long. Cut a little strange. Not sure ld recommend them. I had them taken up.
To long in leg didn't feel like wrangler quality

I liked these jeans; the material was quite thick and they were well made. The downside is I ordered a 34" waist which I already have and are quite loose but these ones i could barely get up my legs but had no chance at the waist. I would have estimated they were 30 -32" waist so returned. I didn't order a replacement as wasn't sure if it was labelled wrong or whether I needed to order 2 sizes up from the wranglers I currently wear. I perhaps just got an odd pair and like I said the quality of the material compared to many others was very good but I’ll buy from a shop when I can try them on first.
I did not like the thickness of the denim.
reviews.review_title: when ordering stretch jeans  consider ordering a slightly smaller size to allow for the stretch.

reviews.review_content: Bit baggy

I still have 3 pairs of well worn Wranglers at home, all of them are size 32Wx32L all of them are Texas Stretch Straight.Two were made in Turkey (bought 2011) and One was made in Bangladesh (bought 2013).Until today, I have always bought my jeans from the high street shops and always in size 32 Regular or 32Wx32L.The jeans I have received today are also size 32Wx32L. They were made in Mauritius.The quality of the jeans seems to be quite good, but maybe not as stretchy as my previous jeans, but I suspect they will loosen a bit once washed.The waist is pretty much the same as beforeThe length of the legs is 2 inches too long compared to my previous Wranglers Texas Stretch 32Wx32L (the photos are showing my old jeans and new jeans on top of each other, the old jeans are the discoloured ones).
reviews.review_title: Too long compared to my previous 32Wx32L

reviews.review_content: unfortunately these weren't tried on for size until too late,  labelled sizing did not match the garment
Not my style

These are great jeans, the slim style is just right. But the waist measurement is wrong. Labelled 34, but when measured with a tape measure, they were clearly 32. A pity, as I liked everything else. Service and refund very good.

After 3 months of standard use, wearing the jeans for 2-3 days per week and washing them once a week, the denim on the backside part of the jeans is wearing thin and one large hole has appeared next to the seam of a pocket on the backside. No snagging on anything - I work from home and am mostly sitting at my desk, and do some mild walking. These jeans have not been worked hard at all.I was really pleased with these when I bought them and they have been great, but I'm not sure whether to be pleased about a 3 month usable life-span. Maybe that's all we can expect nowadays in the UK?
reviews.review_title: Great price, seem great quality at first, but...

reviews.review_content: Bought these on a special deal. I am not a brand person but I was unhappy with the fit of many cheaper jeans.These are a great fit for me, but immediately after receiving I noticed a slight lightness next to the Right hand leg seam.After their first wash the result was as the picture.I love them, but quality jeans should not do this.I can't seem to replace them only refund which is not what I want.Please can I have a replacement pair without the fraying?
Delivered exactly what was ordered, when they said it would be delivered, at the price advertised.Just as it should be!
The quality is good but the hems are wider than my other strait leg wranglers I've got so not as pleased
These was bought as a gift

As with a lot of denim products at the momnet, the material used on these is thin, but the added elastane does mean they have some give in them and are very comportable. The extra belt loops are a nice touch from other "brands".I would wait to buy when they are on offer, as I've seen and bought these at £38 rather than the ful £70-£80 they are "normally".
reviews.review_title: Comfortable, but get these when they on a deal

reviews.review_content: Waist is true to size, length is fine, possibly slightly long
The item was received in two days and was brand new as specified.The  jeans was original and of good quality.
The leg length was slightly long at 34 inches but the next shorter is 32 inches. I would have liked to have 33 inches to select for a perfect fit. Otherwise everything else fitted perfectly.
Just what was required.
These Wrangler's are Grade A1,1st class. My new Wrangler Texas jeans fit perfectly and are the best quality denim, bought at a very competitive price.
A pair of the best jeans I have bought, perfect fit and really comfortable. Great quality. Thinking of getting another pair.
Nice Jeans, good fit. Thankyou
Good quality jeans. Delivery fast. 5  star product and good fit.
Great jeans at great price.  Good amount of stretch too
Love them
Brilliant stuff, thank you so much
Very good
Not as durable as they used to be, too much strech in the material now
The jeans were purchased as part of a Christmas gift.They have withstood time, machine washing & still look smart on the recipient. 😊

reviews.review_content: Well made, good quality … slightly on the big side
I bought this in December, my partner developed a pain to the feet from this socks, avoid!
reviews.review_title: I m not sure what to say

reviews.review_content: Terrible, hundreds of loose threads
The 6-8 size may fit ok for a 7 or 8 foot but too large for someone with size 6 feet. The next size down will I expect be too small. So no good for me really. Disappointed.

Very disappointed with the quality of these socks. Like all new clothes the first thing I do is throw them in the washing machine before wearing them. You can see how this pair turned out in the photo’s after removing them from the machine. I washed the whole pack (6 pairs) and in all fairness the other socks are fine but this pair shows that the overall quality is very poor. I was refunded £2 by the seller after contacting them. Would I recommend these socks? Sadly not!
I don’t think these are made of a breathable material. Make your feet v sweaty and rubbing causes blisters.

3 of the black socks are ok so far, however two of the white socks split at the seam on the toes after one wear! My puma and adidas socks are still going strong after a year so can only put it down to poor quality.
Nice thick socks, but the black fluff that comes off is a pain
These are very comfortable socks. Fast forward 2 weeks an nearly every pair has a hole along the seam. They’re not built to last - especially if you’re active! Avoid!

The socks are described as “cushioned” sport socks, f you a buying for a sports or running sock their is absolutely no cushioning in these socks and made from thin cotton, I can’t see them lasting long, ok as a general every day trainer sock but don’t waste your money if you are looking for something more substantial. They are also on the large side so much so I purchased two packs and have given one to my husband!!
reviews.review_title: Poor quality for a sports/running sock - not cushioned as described and quite big

reviews.review_content: Second Badge od this produkt didn't much a quality of my previous first order, this was a cheap option nowhere near a previous  quality with 85% cotton. Second tíme ordered socks are uncomfortable , after first wash they are too tight on my foot and marking my skin under under ankles, cannot stand it in my foot need to take it off, they are hard not soft and not as elastic. I do recommend second order at least.
reviews.review_title: Not a previous quality of first order socks

reviews.review_content: I was hopefully, these stocks feel nicely padded at first. But they developed a hole after the first wash. I'll mend them, but I'm disappointed and won't be buying more.
socks are fine if you ignore the damn thing slips down your ankle the 1st time its worn.
Don't like the feel of them. And the back part where you back foot is, is weird too. Don't buy them.
Almost all of them have these holes 🕳 in them and it doesn’t have that cushion as described
reviews.review_title: It’s not worth the buying. Waste of money 😡

reviews.review_content: Quickly looses fluff. Not very durable. Last c.8 months before holes in sole.

These are decent quality socks, but the ones I received were ridiculously oversized - which is why I have only given 2 stars.  I have absolutely standard UK size 8 feet and ordered the size 6-8 pack expecting them to be snug.  They're not - they are massive and much too big for me.  They were packaged up as the correct size so it is not a picking and packing error by Amazon - this appears to be how they are made.  I wonder if they actually manufacture these socks in one size, and then just package them up in different sizes to help them sell better.  I hate oversized socks so I'm very disappointed as these were not cheap.
It constricts my ankles and leaves marks if I wear them for a while. Not ideal. The ankle cuff is also higher up the ankle than expected so it is not ideal for lower trainers.
reviews.review_title: The cuff around the ankle is rough

reviews.review_content: These socks are really too big. I bought these for size 5 yet they fit my partners size 10 feet much better. I have about 1.5 inch of sock left over at my toes which is hugely frustrating as This the most I've spend on socks in years. I ordered the smallest size too. Socks are decent quality but not for small feet.
Not a best fit f

They seem like decent quality but I was sent 12 left socks! They’re still comfy but I suspect they’ll wear out quickly because the thicker panel, designed to protect the outside of the foot/toes, ends up on the inside when worn on the right foot (see picture)!
Decent for the price but they don't last long and lose their strechiness over time.
Only recently purchased but appear good quality. Are quite thick so good for extra cushioning but can make trainers tighter.
Nice and thick sole

I purchased size 6-8.I am a female with size 8 feet and these socks are too big, at least couple of sizes larger than what they should be! I previously purchased this brand in the same size and they fitted perfectly, so I was highly confident that these would be a great fit too.I realised too late how poor a fit they are - after I already washed them ready for the first use and got rid of packaging. Otherwise they would have been returned!For £16, this is a lot of money for socks that I won’t be using!

Great price and fit entirely as expected.  Unfortunately, they do not wick moisture as well as I had hoped and certainly not as well as my other branded running socks.  Instead, they tend to hold the moisture in, making my feet hot when running and are damp on removing.  Sadly, I won't be buying these again.
reviews.review_title: Not as good as I had hoped

reviews.review_content: Too thick and advert makes them look like secret socks.  Too high above the shoe.

Bought these for my partner who is fed up of throwing holey socks out . Reading through the description of them , I had great expectations. However despite their comfort and support , which he has been really impressed with, since Christmas he has already gone through 4 of the socks . Tbh, they have lasted longer than other socks , but to say that they are guaranteed no holes is simply not true .
reviews.review_title: Comfy but definitely not hole free

reviews.review_content: Good fit and wash up well

I bought these socks and at the same time bought some similar but cheaper alternatives. The quality if these socks was far better and I was going to buy more until I exercised in them. After a long walk I found my feet were covered in black fluff from the socks. I have hand washed a few pairs inside out to try and remove the fluff but it still happens when worn for exercise.

Everything about this sweatshirt is great but why is the choice of colours in men’s clothing so limited? I often wear pink garments because pink is a colour that can be combined with nearly any other colour without clashing. It seems to me that the range of colours offered to customers is based on unacceptable sexist thinking that pink is a ‘girly’ colour.  Let me point out-1/ Pink was regarded as very much a male colour until about the beginning of the 20th century.2/ The chances that a man wears pink increases as the social status of the man increases.3/ The most talented player ever to play football now wears pink all the time. If Messi can wear pink, why shouldn’t we?

Nothing wrong with the quality of the socks but I didn't expect it to be 4 same packs of  3 heel-coloured socks. The photo suggests every pair of socks would have a different coloured heel.

I supposedly bought some of these a few weeks ago. Quite liked them, great value, so figured while I was at it I'd stock up with another 12 pairs... figuring that as they randomly wear, I could throw away the odd individual worn ones and pair up with whatever's left.Also figured having a lot of the same design would be easy to pair up after washing.So imagine my disappointment when I open up my latest delivery, check out the socks, put them next to the ones I bought a few weeks ago, and now find they're not exactly the same. The stripes are different. See attached photo.So I can't cross-pair them with the ones already purchased.When I check them against the illustration right now, these that have just arrived do match the illustration as it appears today. But I could have sworn that I did the same when I bought my first set just a few weeks ago, and I could have sworn they matched the picture at that time as well.It does bug me that it's telling me at the top of the page "purchased 2 times" .... I disagree. The two purchases would appear to be different products. If I'd purchase the same product two times, I'd be able to cross pair them.It's really annoying because now I'm going to have to root around a lot more to pair up the socks after they've come out of the washing machine. And as they wear out, I won't be able to mix and match the remaining good socks from the two different purchases.Basically I now have 12 sets of 2 pairs each, instead of the 6 sets of 4 pairs each that I expected to end up with.And worse still, although the patterns aren't completely the same, they are still similar, which is going to make finding the partners in the unsorted laundry even more difficult.The new socks also appear to be somewhat bigger fit than the previous pair. I've just tried one on and the heel on the new sock comes up beyond my actual heel. The original purchase a few weeks ago had them at the right point. Though perhaps these new ones will shrink in the wash... the original ones have had a couple of washes already.Oh well, at least at £9.99 for 12 they're really good value.My overall 3 star rating reflects that fact that you can't be sure what you're buying. My original purchase would have been 5 stars. But if you supposedly order the same thing a second time just 3 or 4 weeks later, and find they aren't the same thing you bought previously, that does somewhat undermine the value.Amazon really should indicate on their listings whether product pages are 'placeholders' for generic things. Not only can't you be sure of what you're buying if you 'buy again', but also it undermines trust in the reviews and ratings when reviews remain in place, but the product in the page changes.
reviews.review_title: What was I buying? What am I reviewing?

These are comfortable socks, good for the price, hold their elasticity and shape even after washing several times.However, these are basic socks, which is reflected in the price. If you're walking a good deal, then expect them to go thin on the heel after several months. They also have a tendency to shed black specks which is a pain if you have carpet because your vacuum will struggle to pick them up when they quickly get tangled in the carpet threads.All in all, they're a decent sock though. A good bulk buy when you just need plenty of black cotton socks in the drawer for every day use. The toe and heel colours are useful to match them up after washing, and if one wears through it's no problem using pairs made of different colours...unless you're wearing them with sandals. And if THAT'S the case, your cred has already been shot and you might as well show you're wearing odd colours anyway. Enjoy.

reviews.review_title: Good for use in the summer

reviews.review_content: I always purchase 36" waist trousers or shorts and then wear a belt. This allows for a certain amount of expansion at key times for the year..... These 36" shorts fit without the need of a belt and so are undersized compaired to products sold by a long list of high street names. Apart from the waist, the shorts are what you would expect for a non-brand low cost pair of shorts the best thing I can say is that I will be purchasing another pair at some stage.
reviews.review_title: OK, but watch out for the waist

reviews.review_content: Great

I bought these shorts with trepidation due to the vastly differing reviews on Amazon. Some said they were far too small and some said miles too big. One reviewer even said they were cut funny and cut into his bum crack uncomfortably. My son really needed something similar for work and I couldn't find a pair of black cargo shorts anywhere else so in the end I just went for it and ordered his normal size with my fingers crossed that they would fit OK. When they arrived he was out so I laid them up against another pair of his shorts, bought from Tesco that I knew fitted him well and the waistband was EXACTLY the same size and sure enough, when he came home and tried them on, they fitted him fine. He always wears a size 30 inch waist which is a fraction loose on him but he uses a belt and prefers them comfy. I asked him if they cut anywhere or were loose anywhere else and he did a few Ninja type moves in them to demonstrate that they were not uncomfortable, did not cut into him or restrict his movement in any way. They are not made from a stretchy fabric but the material is very nice and the shorts look smart, despite the pockets on the leg. There is no sag or loss of shape if you use the pockets, provided they are not over-loaded. So, if you are thinking about buying these shorts and are put off by the contradicting reviews, I would just go for it. Different retailers have different ideas about sizing and some cut stingily and others generously so I would just buy your normal size and have a little faith.
Didn't like these so returned them.
